title: Good overnight stay
review: Having driven from Miami airport in rush hour traffic, we were warmly welcomed and given drinks from the bar. The lounge is large as it is also the dining area for the bistro on site. We had an evening meal & breakfast at the bistro and both were good. The room was spacious and quiet even though the hotel is situated near major roads. A pleasant hotel, well maintained & with excellent service.

title: Cockroch In Bed..Look Elsewhere
review: I give this hotel 2 out of 5 stars and I explain why, all the way from the beginning. Me and my cousin, arrived early at the hotel which they allowed us to keep our bags in the back until our room was finish. We requested early check in, and poolside room on the ground level. Just a warning, if you are not an iguana or gecko person. Please do NOT request ground level as this is a known species in Fort Lauderdale area. Once our room was finish about 2pm. The rest of the evening went well. They do provide a shuttle service from the hotel and to the hotel within 3 miles radius. So this is also a nice complimentary to the guest. Also, we even got drinks made down at the bar which was awesome. The next day, me and my cousin ran errands for about 4hrs. Just prior to leaving for the morning , we notice the housekeeper was like 2 doors down from our room cleaning. Well, 4hrs later we return back to our room not being touched or cleaned. The housekeeper was across in another room. So when asked, why is our room still not refreshed when you were a couple doors down hours ago. She stated we were next. Around 2pm, the housekeeper finally came. Not a big deal, Right! We just didnt let it bother us. Well the next day is when the disaster happen. While getting ready for the morning. My cousin was in the next bed. All of a sudden I notice this big brown bug on her bed. I screamed, and my cousin hopped out of bed. She suffers from panic attacks so my scream freaked her out. She said what is it. I said OMG there is a cockroach on your bed, hanging on the sheets. She barely could catch her breath. So I called the front desk and ask if they can have someone come to room 111. There is a big brown bug in one of the beds. After waiting almost 5 mins for someone to come. I had to calm my cousin down because she was freaking out and couldnt catch her breath. When the janitor guy came and hit it. The cockroach was trying to crawl back under the mattress between the sheets. After he killed it. We requested to be move to another room. The front desk staff was very apologetic and nice BUT the length of time to get another room was again a long time. 2hrs of waiting in the entertainment lounge area when clearly the accommodation could have been handle quicker in our instance. Not only did they say they did not have any 2 queen bed rooms avaliable. They said it was only a king room on the 5th floor. Well just receiving another room and a complimentary drink in this instance just wasnt enough. After mentioning a refund of a night stay. The lady at the desk mentioned she has to put it through with her manager. My cousin was so freaked out she just was terrified to lay in the bed. Please be aware this staff is friendly, however, the wait time is ridiculous and not just because of our room change but housekeeping and the shuttle service as well. We waited about an hour for a shuttle to come back and get us when the front desk staff kept saying he on his way. It took 3 calls to try to get an eta which end up being an hour. The cockroach was the icing on the cake for us. To know that a cockroach was in the bed with u for however long is disgusting especially to someone who suffers from anxiety. This hotel is not the best in Fort Lauderdale. There is better. Plus I recommend getting a rental to drive to places. It's like a 15 min drive to the main beach of Fort Lauderdale. I would not stay here every again. Highly disappointed. The staff was friendly but the rooms are not the best. I would definitely recommend to look elsewhere. Update: The hotel end up sending my cousin a email, apologizing for what occurred. They did end up giving us 2 nights free of our visit. So basically a 2 night refund. Marriott is a great company, never had issues staying at any other of their hotels but this one was just a terrifying experience.…

title: More for a Business Traveller
review: Dear Vettaboo623,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your review. We are so happy to hear that the staff were very friendly and responded to your needs during your stay. We will make sure they continue to provide that kind of customer service. I am, however, truly disappointed that you experienced multiple issues. This is certainly not the norm, and I am extremely sorry we were not able to exceed your expectations.  Please do not hesitate to contact me directly if you would like to further discuss your recent experience as we are committed to excellence.  Sincerely, Mary Apple

title: Landmark referral
review: I stayed here as I had medical treatments at the hospital near-by. The other hotel guests were mainly business travellers who probably get a better deal than I did. $150 pn with no breakfast. The hotel decor is very dated. The breakfast room itself is not inviting.  However it is a good position on US close to all major shopping and big box stores and a Dennys across the street.  On the plus side, the staff were excellent, the check in staff, the driver and the housekeeper were all very nice people. They also offer a free bus to any restaurants or the beach within a 3 mile radius, and came and picked me up. Parking is free also.

title: Convenient hotel with typical Courtyard standars
review: Dear GladysAF,  Thank you very much for your time in providing valuable feedback. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our property’s location, our complimentary shuttle, and our wonderful staff. I will be sure to share your comments with our team as they appreciate the recognition. I am, however, so disappointed that we were not able to exceed your expectations.  Your comments in regards to the decor has been noted and will be considered in the future.  As a valued guest, we thank you again for your feedback and we hope to serve you again whenever your travels bring you back to Fort Lauderdale.  Sincerely, Mary Apple

title: Bed bugs
review: The room and bathroom was clean however my daughter woke up with several bed bug bites all over her legs.   Overall the hotel was basic overall. I’m surprised that Marriott would want to put their name to the place.

title: Great hotel, recommended
review: Dear bip4,  I am very perturbed to learn of your experience. We have several measures in place to prevent such an occurrence, including protective covers in all guest rooms and preventative daily inspections. Please be assured we take such matters very seriously. Please contact me directly at 954-771-8100 so I may rectify any concerns.

title: Not nearly as good as most reviews
review: We stayed at this hotel in August 2019 and we truly enjoyed our time in there. Check-in/check-out is a speedy process, staff is great and really helpful. The room was very clean and spacious. The pool was kept clean at all times and the towels changed quite often. Laundry room and gym are easily accessible (on the ground floor) and are also very clean. Try and get a room with a view on the pool and avoid the ground floor if possible.

title: Comfortable property!
review: We stayed in this hotel in May 2019. All the reviews were very very good. We found this hotel very disappointing. Hotel staff was informed and very unprofessional. Our phone did not work and was never fixed in the four days that we were there. And I overheard other guest complaining of the same problem even someone who needed the phone working for her because she had a sick husband there .  The area around the hotel is undesirable our room was dirty with stains on the carpet in the hallway  there was garbage and a spilled drinks and puddles. I even slipped on the steps one day because someone had spilled a drink and left the cup sitting there. I saw the cup and the spill still there eight hours later.  They say they have a little snack area with drinks but that was never start…

title: Excellent Hotel with Great Service
review: Dear Expedition750183,  I am truly disappointed that this is your impression of our hotel. This is certainly not the norm. I am extremely regretful we were not able to exceed your expectations during your past stay, as that is our main goal!  I have shared your comments with our entire team in an effort to improve our overall service.  Please feel free to contact me directly to discuss exactly the details of you stay, so we can take the proper corrective measures.   Sincerely, Mary Apple General Manager

title: Clean, well-appointed room. Excellent staff.
review: Stayed here for three nights on a recent trip. The experience was very good. Staff was excellent and the room was very nice. My only negative experience was that the room was heavily scented (almost overwhelming) with some kind of air freshener. I tried airing the place out but the scent returned quickly. This was a minor inconvenience, though.  The hotel is located just a little over a mile from the beach. I both drove and walked to the beach. The drive is, of course, very short. The walk is not bad either.

title: Okay stay
review: Had a quick one night stay to hopefully take advantage of the tail end of a business trip to catch some fun before flying home.  The hotel is a typical Courtyard Marriott without a lot of thrills. It is too bad the pool is pretty dated and not very inviting to lounge around, especially without any umbrellas for shade. Renting beach chairs and umbrellas on the beach is a bit of a rip off so at the end I didn’t really get a chance to really relax.  BonVoy platinum recognition was either points or a $10 voucher as they do not have a full service breakfast place.

title: Third Times the Charm
review: Checking into the hotel for my 6-day stay was a breeze. However, being placed into a room that was ready for my stay was a bit challenging. I had to change rooms twice in less than 2-hours of my stay. During those 2-hours, three hotel employees were in my room with me sorting out a TV issue. It was very time consuming and rather awkward having to babysit my luggage while they worked to sort out the issue. I was finally able to relax in my new room after 2 hours.  All three rooms I was placed in had a faint cat pee and musky smell to it that subsided moments after entering. The AC works great and the shower was very relaxing. Overall it was an okay stay, but things could have certainly been better.  Oh, and the food at the hotel was excellent!

title: Homey feel
review: Dear Pioneer44370423426,  Thanking you for sharing your thoughts about your recent stay. We are so happy that you were able to escape the South Florida, enjoy The Bistro, and were able to relax in your room. We are, however, so sorry that you had to switch your rooms multiple times.  We certainly understand how frustrating that must have been. Please feel free to contact me directly to discuss the details of you stay, so we can take the proper corrective measures. Hopefully, next time you stay with us, we will be able to exceed your expectations!  Warmest regards, Mary Apple General Manager

title: Fine hotel, clean but a little noisy
review: I stayed at this hotel because it was in close proximity of the Holy Cross hospital. The staff was friendly. The room was cleaned daily however there is room for improvement. The bathroom was not cleaned thoroughly  and headboard and and night stand was dusty. It is certainly not the worst just room for improvement. This hotel offers shuttle service within a 3 miles radius and it is about a 10 mins walk to the Holy Cross hospital.   There is a restaurant on site, gym, pool, jacuzzi and also a laundry room for guest and   complimentary detergent is available via the front desk. There is a Bank of America, CVS  and a Deneny's near by.  I would recommend this hotel. My room number was 5014. Especially for the professionalism and making me feel at home.

title: Sister's trip to see Michelle Obama's Book Tour
review: Nice Area. Traffic was not terrible and easy to find the area. Not far from the beach and major shopping and restaurants. THe beach was less than 4 miles away. Hotel was about 20 minutes from the airport.

title: Clean and Friendly Staff
review: We walked into this property late at night after leaving an awful hotel. The front desk agent was friendly and welcoming. Our room was clean, updated, and comfortable. We only stayed one night but we enjoyed it!

title: Will never book at Marriott again!
review: After a long flight to Fl we finally arrived at this hotel to check in around 10:30pm to find out they overbooked and didn’t have room for us.  The couple ahead of us was dealing with the same thing.  They sent us to another Marriott and paid for it, that is the only reason I’m giving them a ‘1’ rating.

title: Great room
review: Dear TomandPita,  Please accept my sincerest apology that we were not able to honor your reservation due to unforeseen circumstances on the date of your arrival. I can imagine how frustrating this must have been, especially following a long day of travel. While such circumstances are rare, please be assured I am following up with our Front Office and Sales teams so that we may better prevent such occurrences. Although we fell short of meeting your expectations, I hope you will consider Courtyard Fort Lauderdale East on your next visit to Fort Lauderdale, so that we can deliver the experience you deserve.   Sincerely, Mary Apple  General Manager

title: Room 5608
review: Comfortable Great view and pool beds were fluffy nice bar area and lobby.  Staff was fantastic and friendly.  Asked for a double room and staff changed me from king to double without any problems. Breakfast was $16 but I choose a local restaurant near the cruise ship. I enjoyed this hotel and great shopping was nearby

title: A nice little secret
review: With a nice pool and hot tub, and a 1.5 mile walk to the beach, this location can handle vacation plans for singles and couples. Families, for logistical reasons, will probably want to the at the beach. Clean, well cared for, friendly. Worst flaws: a small spot of mould behind the soap tray in the shower; the flourescent tube over the mirror was on its last legs; the doors to the room tower occasionaly did not respond to the room key. All in all a good deal and a nice property.

title: Business trip!
review: Very nice rooms and helpful staff. The Bestro has delicious carrot cake as well 👍 The pool area and hot tub are well maintained with pool towels on site 😎  Parking is abundant and very secure. They have a shuttle that you can take to the near downtown are for travelers that don’t have a car, or for people who don’t want to drive!   I Highly recommend this hotel

title: Above and Beyond
review: I cannot say enough good things about this hotel! The rooms are very nice - clean,  lots of towels, comfy beds. The hotel has a lovely pool and pool area, delightful for sun bathing. The location is convenient, just one mile from the beach and near many excellent restaurants. The food at the Bistro is a treat.. The very best thing, however - and the reason we will return - is the staff. Brittany, at the front desk, simply can't do enough to insure that your stay is perfect in every way. She literally goes above and beyond for every guest.

title: Group stay march  2019
review: We stayed a group of 26 people at this hotel and had a wonderful service ! great rooms, friendly people, we return every year. the only hotel option for our group. we love the place, near the fort Lauderdale executive.

title: Best Hotel ever!
review: I was so impressed with our stay here, from everyone that works here. The staff could not have been more friendly or helpful. They have a bistro for breakfast which is included in your room for a  fee. Mora ( not sure I spelled it right) but she greeted us every morning taking our breakfast order. Housekeeping did an awesome job and the entire grounds and inside the hotel was kept up wonderfully. My only complaint was the Kleenex were too rough! Pretty good.... a wonderful experience and you can bet Courtyard by Marriott will be my “go to place”!

title: Excellent service
review: We had a great experience during a recent stay, in large part due to the service we received from the Bistro Manager, Evangeline, who was working at the front desk when we checked in. She was extremely helpful when we had a room issue and personally escorted us to our new room to verify that it was suitable. She provided recommendations and coupons for nearby restaurants. Overall we had a pleasant stay and would come back to this hotel.

title: Cruise related stay
review: We stayed at this facility the night prior to leaving for a Caribbean cruise. There was a large family group of us, 12, from the east and west coasts. The hotel had a nice location relative to the embarkation port. One nice bonus was a convenience store very close by.  The rooms were quite nice with good Wi-Fi. One issue was that an elevator was out of service which made for long waits.   Transportation to the port was really available and reasonably price. Given the crowds in the lobby at the time that we left for the ship, it was clear that a major portion of the guests of the hotel that evening were there for the purpose of boarding ships. Given the size of the crowds waiting for transportation to ships, it would be advisable not to wait till the last minute to arrange for…

title: Great stay.
review: Stayed one night at this Courtyard and it was very good. The room was clean, spacious and it had everything I needed, so I can't complain. The front desk agents were helpful and were in a good mood. Federal Highway has many restaurants, so the location is good. Their Bistro is open for breakfast (not included) and they also have a marketplace to grab and go.

title: Noise
review: Decent Hotel.  Nice pool area but traffic noise is horrible. Nice grounds. Room Typical. Nice lobby. Short drive to beach. Traffic this time of year is a real bear. I would suggest that if your in Florida for the beach. Stay on the beach not inland.

title: Fantastic stay !
review: Dear WE273,  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you! We are glad you enjoyed the hotel’s amenities and location, however we are disappointed we were not able to exceed your expectations, as this is what we strive for! As a valued guest, we thank you for your feedback, and we hope to serve you again whenever your travels bring you back to Fort Lauderdale.  Sincerely, Mary Apple  General Manager

title: Across from the Beach  - View of Intracoastal
review: This is a nice hotel for a night or two- friendly staff from valet to the front desk - very very clean- great little bistro on site with Starbucks built in- service was slow but not bad- one side faces the intracoastal waterway and boats and the other side faces the beach - its across from the beach not right on it - nice location for Los Olas restaurants and  Locals go to Coconuts --- Probably not a long term stay place - but nice for a couple of nights

title: Ok for one night
review: Courtyard is fine for one night. Otherwise I think we would have stayed elsewhere. It’s right at the crossroads os US 1 and Commercial Blvd so it’s like Times Square in Florida. Traffic runs all night long and rooms are not soundproof. Rooms are showing wear but basically clean and well stocked with towels, etc. A big shoutout to Brittany at the front desk. She’s very personable and courteous. Gave us a weather report and upgraded us all while juggling ringing phones and other guests walking in. A really nice young lady; she gives the Marriott image a real boost. Parking here is free and there’s a pretty decent pool here as well. Just a shame about the location.

title: Nice hotel, great location
review: Dear Sbrantley,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. We are thankful to hear that the staff responded to your needs, and were very friendly during your stay. We will make sure they continue to provide that kind of customer service to all guest.  I am so sorry that you were disturbed by exterior noise.  All our rooms are equipped with thick hurricane proof balcony doors, which considerably mitigate exterior noise. Next time you are in town, please be sure to let me know and I will do everything possible to assign you the quietest room in the hotel!   Sincerely, Mary Apple General Manager

title: Perfect location
review: Stayed here one night before heading out on a cruise. It was clean and had nice employees who helped us get to the cruise Port. A short walk to the beach so we could visit and splash before heading out. Would recommend.

title: Excellent Accommodations
review: For your ideal location, while touring the Miami area south, and the Boca area to the north.  Lots of restaurants, movies and shopping nearby, as is the beach.  Had the "suite" which was huge.  I would return.

title: Summer vacation
review: Generally good experience at this hotel. Friendly and courteous staff. Clean rooms and cozy atmosphere. I friends totally enjoyed our stay. Close to shopping and other activities. Will return to this hotel again.

title: Another great stay!
review: It was my second stay at this hotel. I returned because I really enjoyed staying there last year.  Rooms are very clean and beds are comfortable. The views are awesome (I had a room overlooking the Marina). There is no Windows, but a glass wall from ceiling to floor.   There is fridge, coffee maker, good air conditioning, wi-fi Nice staff at the Front Desk.  Big outdoor swimming pool. The Bistrô is really good with very reasonable  prices. Location is fabulous as it is walking distance to restaurants, ice cream parlors, stores, and it has access to the beach.  There is no beach service though. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Good value & locaion
review: Free parking and close to everything  - as in a max 7 min drive.  Nice check in staff. Great room that's modern. Not a particularly attractive hotel but has all the basics. Nice set up and facilities ar good. Recommended.

title: Nice place staff make it worthwhile
review: Good place... Granted you are forced to get Starbucks for breakfast but the water is good the food choices are reasonable. I guess I would stay here again Rooms are nice, water pressure is great beds are comfy. But the great thing is the staff they go way out of their way to make you feel good.

title: nice place
review: We stayed 1 night, decent place.   It's not the normal Courtyard hotel, they bought into a hotel and branded with name.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.   The hotel is located about a mile from the beach and a lot of great places for food and drink.  We didn't eat at the Bistro but were told by many the food was really good.  The housekeeping staff were pretty loud for an early Sunday morning, that could be addressed.  At checkout, mentioned that the tub was draining slowly, maybe they could have someone take a look, the response was "nobody has reported that before" - WOW,  the tub was draining slowly.   I'm sure that it won't be addressed.   We shouldn't have to talk with a manager to know that problems are being looked into.   I probably wouldn't stay here again, it was…

title: Great location away from the i95
review: My family and i stayed both at the start and end of our Orlando vacation. Clean and friendly hotel with a great new Bistro providing tasty evening meals.  We had an early evening flight out of Miami and the hotel was more than happy to offer us a late check out until 15:00 which we appreciated very much.

title: Happy with my stay
review: I stayed here for business for four nights.  I wanted something close enough to night life, but far enough away that I would not see the signs of wear and tear. Staff is very welcoming and nice. Rooms are clean and kept up- meaning you can tell there is no partying that has gone on here.  Maybe one drawback is hotel is on busy street so... yes...there are traffic sounds. Not a big deal for me. I would recommend this as a business hotel and will stay again.

title: Not by the sea
review: Probably 3 miles from the ocean. BUT having said that, clean, safe hotel. I stayed there because of the close proximity to Holy Cross Hospital. They offer a shuttle from 7:00AM to 9:30PM within a 3 mile proximity from the hotel. Little bistro with good food but limited choices. Front desk staff was friendly and helpful. Hotel offers a Holy Cross Hospital rate of $99 per night.

title: AWESOME Hotel and WONDERFUL Beach
review: The hotel is in a great location with easy access to the beach and multiple places to eat and/or drink.  Upon check-in our room wasn't ready and we were asked to check back in one hour.  They happened to be handing out the largest chocolate chip cookies I've ever seen; which we enjoyed while waiting by the pool.  When checking on our room the second time they told us it wasn't ready but they treated us to a spectacular upgrade!!  Shazud and Daniesha at the front desk promised the upgrade would not disappoint and it certainly didn't!!!  The presidential suite was fabulous and has an amazing view of the ocean.  We will definitely be back and stay again in the near future.

title: Cozy place
review: VeryNice hotel with amenities in the depth of the Sunshine state. Very clean and vibrant atmosphere, fresh food; prices could be somewhat at the upper hand but worth it. Customer service devoted personnel,flaws free. Thi is a perfect hotel for your stay at ft. Lauderdale.

title: Very impressed with this hotel!
review: I decided to stay at the Marriott Courtyard based on the great rate and that they allowed my service dog in training. The staff could not have been more accommodating. The folks in the breakfast area were excellent and served a delicious breakfast. The rooms were very clean and close to the pool area. I had a dog with me and he was perfectly happy on the first floor, whereby I could let it out to go to the bathroom quickly. I plan to return the week after next and the week after that, that's how much I enjoyed my stay. Love this hotel!

title: Nice Hotel, Great Pool, Good Breakfast — FREE SHUTTLE!
review: Nice NON-SMOKING Hotel in a good location close to many attractions. Great Pool, Good Breakfast (limited selections) that is a great deal if you include it with your room rate. — FREE SHUTTLE for anywhere up to 3 miles away!

title: Nice pool
review: Rooms are a little small but clean. food at the bistro was good and the pool was very nice . A lot of things to do in the area and the beach was just down the road from here . Traffic is a little noisy

title: Better than expected
review: Dear dkb82946,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your review.  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the pool and the food served in The Bistro. I am however so sorry to hear you were disturbed by surrounding traffic noise. We are terribly disappointed to hear our hotel did not meet your expectations. We thank you for the opportunity to serve you and hope to see you during your next visit to Fort Lauderdale!   Kindest regards,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Well suited for a business traveller
review: First impressions were not great as there was nobody on reception, then a man turned up carrying what looked like his take away meal, but he ignored me and went through to the back.  Thankfully a delightful young man turned up and checked us in. The first room he gave us had a broken nightstand. The drawer would not shut and was hanging open in front of the bed. He quickly gave us another room which was large and very clean with a huge bed. The bathroom had a huge shower and was spotless. There was a balcony overlooking the car park.  The bed was comfortable but I just can’t understand the way the duvet is not in a proper duvet cover, just in a sheet. The duvet was grubby and stained and it was almost impossible to stop it coming apart from the sheet during the night so that it…

title: Fair hotel
review: This courtyard looks good, service looks good.. But specific to us...our experience was not optimal... We cked in late after having a long day so we were really anxious to get to the room..well, the keys given did not work.. There was no luggage cart available.. The toilet got plugged up... No one could come to unplug it after calling for over two hours so I got the plunger and unplugged it myself... Everything else was good so I think what happened to me was just bad luck.

title: Nice weekend stay
review: Nice hotel, good location close to beach area but not on the beach.  Pool was very nice, clean and warm.  The bistro inside lobby had good food, excellent tomato soup. The staff was very pleasant and the hotel clean.  We had a fifth floor room and the shower water pressure was terrible.  Only one ice machine was working and only one elevator.  These are fixable issues and would have made the stay nicer.  All in all a good value hotel.

title: Good hotel and pool
review: Dear Bob G,  Please allow me to sincerely apologize for not providing you with the flawless experience you deserve when staying at a Marriott. We seldom have the issues you experienced, and even though now corrected, we understand how frustrating this must have been. Please accept our most sincere apologies. I truly thank you for sharing your thoughts as they allow us to constantly improve.   Sincerely,   Mary Apple General Manager

title: Easter weekend wowed
review: We stayed at the hotel for two nights having flown to Miami and before travelling up to Orlando. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the pool area was very nice and the hotel was in a good location for the beach. We didn't use it but the hotel shuttle would do complimentary trips to the nearby beach, or anywhere within 3 miles

title: Good stay for golf trip
review: The location was impeccable!!!! Even the grass was perfectly trimmed you couldn't even find dust on it I was so impressed with the cleanliness of this Resort. Had a wonderful atmosphere are sweet overlooked the pool. Everyone has a balcony so I was very refreshing to open up and have coffee outside the weather was wonderful I can tell you that the lobby had a wonderful little Starbucks quality Cafe and you can have cocktails at night. Every single employee from housekeeping reception even maintenance had a welcoming smile very courteous. I was very impressed

title: Good location
review: Location was good.  Check in a disaster.  We had three rooms booked a seperate times They lost one of our reservations and argued with me that it didn’t exist.  And then said their was no vacant rooms . They didn’t offer any apology or even offer to help us find room elsewhere. We are gold members. I expected help not to be. Told I was wrong. I had print out and saved email and finally got another staff member who found where one of their staff had delete one of our reservations as two were the same name . I had separate confirmation numbers. The second staff member was much nicer and then spent another 20 min straighten out .  Overall it was an hour plus of frustration, especially to have to deal with this after travelling 14 plus hours.  The first staff member came back then…

title: An excellent location
review: Dear music-soul,  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you! We are glad you enjoyed the hotel’s location, however are disappointed we were not able to exceed your expectations at check-in, as this is what we strive for! We have shared your comments with our staff in hopes to improve our overall guest service. Hopefully, next time you stay with us, we will make your experience be 5 Star worthy!   Sincerely, Mary Apple General Manager

title: too small problems
review: We stayed at the hotel to do some errands in Fort Lauderdale. We stayed for two nights and we plan on going back. The location cannot be beat. The hotel is right next to the Tri-Rail station and I95. Also the airport and port are only a few miles away. Our room was fashionable and comfortable. There is ample free parking, and you can walk to Bass Pro Shops. Restaurants are walking distance too. We enjoyed our stay ,and we look forward to our visit.

title: Good location, clean
review: i have stayed in most all of the marriott  properties varieties , all were very well maintained & furnished. this one is like a old holiday inn refurbished . i & wife had 4 small problems when staying there for 4 days. . Shelby went out her way to compensate us. i have never had 4 small problems at any hotel in last 20 yr.  for 234 / night the hotel s/b nicer 4 circles trip? marriott 4.4?

title: Clean & Nice
review: Never had a bad experience with Marriott and this stay was no different. Clean room, good location, pool and hot tub were nice and the parking situation is awesome. Only thing I wasn’t expecting was the “bistro” which is a little restaurant type place in the lobby that you buy food at instead of continental breakfast.

title: Breakfast supervisor is the worst at this hotel
review: The manager of the breakfast service at this hotel is just plain rude.  She is very short tempered and clearly missed the customer service training Marriott must have provided? It seems she is like this to everyone and the prices are astronomical too - $6.30 for a medium coffee!   Otherwise the staff are great and super helpful especially the front desk manager.

title: Business Trip
review: Dear Tess D,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your review. Your valued feedback highlighted areas that we can improve upon. I have shared your comment with our Bistro Manager, who joins me in offering our sincerest apologies for our team’s shortcomings. We will be reevaluating the Bistro’s guest relation skills, and making the necessary changes to improve our customer service. Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, I hope you will consider Courtyard Fort Lauderdale East on your next visit to Fort Lauderdale so that you can experience the positive changes we’ve made.  Sincerely,  Mary Apple  General Manager

title: Fine Courtyard
review: Clean and comfortable, close to highway close to beach and good restaurants. They have  a small eatery for breakfast and dinner , breakfast before 9:30 and their not kidding not  a minute late or you will have to grab a bite elsewhere.

title: Comfortable urban
review: I am not a big fan of Courtyards in general. They nickle and dime you for everything...don't even offer free coffee in the lobby. This one was as expected, although the front desk clerk did give me a voucher for a free coffee which was nice.  Room was clean. Wireless worked well. Lobby was on the newer side.  Location is convenient off of route 1. I would stay here again.

title: Top Notch Service
review: I’ve stayed before, what’s apparent is the property is cared fo, there is always fresh paint, new carpet..  in short theme property is cared for.  I was impressed with the new breakfast menu, really great and the chefs are lovely ladies who take pride in what they do, really good freshly prepared tastes like Mom made it.     Room was clean and basic, good location and easy access to hospitals, walkable to Holy Cross.  24/7 CVS close and public transport directly in front of hotel.    Plenary of well lit parking.   Friendly staff and very clean property will bring me back on another visit.  I’m not a beach person and find the pool are adequate to stretch out in the sun.  The beach is 10 min drive but fat enough away that location is not a party zone.

title: Beware of these people!!!!!!!!!!
review: I planned a trip to Ft. Lauderdale for a Doctor's Appointment on the September 26, 1917. I live on St. Croix in the US Virgin Islands. Our Island was devastated by a Cat 5 hurricane "Maria" on September 19, 1017. I Booked this Hotel through Expedia because it was highly recommended by the doctor and Hospital "Holy Cross Hospital" that I was seeing, I was to stay for three nights then return home. I was to fly to Ft. Lauderdale on September 25th via Jet Blue and rent a car to reach my destination. The car and flight was also booked through Expedia. When we were hit by Maria we lost electrical power , internet service, had very limited cell service and our airport was closed to commercial traffic for three weeks after the storm. I was not able to contact Expedia immediately so I…

title: Fantastic hotel and staff
review: Dear sgreene55,  We are truly so sorry to hear of the devastation caused by Hurricane Maria.  We are extremely sympathetic when comes to hurricanes, as we also experience the storms here in South Florida, and we know firsthand of the destruction they can cause.  I did some research and it appears that we canceled your reservation and did not charge Expedia.  I am going to reach out to Expedia in hopes to get them to refund you in full.  Please feel free to contact me directly via email to address this matter further.  Sincerely,   Caroline Padden Administrative Coordinator Caroline.padden@marriott.com

title: Great Place to Stay Near Beach and FLL
review: We found the room and hotel to be very clean.  The staff went out of their way to check us in early (had to leave a cruise ship by 9am)  and let us have a late checkout since our flight home was in the evening.

title: Nice location- good hotel - one concern
review: This is the second opportunity we've had to stay at this wonderful hotel. The staff is professional and friendly in the accommodations are excellent. The beach is only 10 minutes away and it only takes about 15 to 20 minutes to get to the Fort Lauderdale International airport.  This Courtyard also has a small Bistro where you can get anything from a cappuccino to sandwiches and pizza. Very handy for travel.

title: Four day business trip
review: The hotel is located perfectly - 1 block from all of the restaurants and bars.  The view from the room was excellent.  My main issue with the hotel was the yellowish faucet water and the slow drainage of the water in the tub and the bathroom.  I called to ask about it and they mentioned it was normal due to proximity to the ocean and the chemicals they use.  I have stayed many times at other hotels in Fort Lauderdale  near the ocean with no such issue.  Otherwise the hotel was good.

title: Find a different location
review: I’ll start by saying I am a loyal elite Marriott member. This location was the worst I’ve ever stayed. The entire first floor smells like mildew. I asked for double beds, called to confirm the beds and they did not have them when I arrived but they did give me another room at no cost. Unfortunately, the additional room was flooded upon entry. Someone had a large dog (based on barking sound) and the outside smelled like a marijuana factory. The location may be convenient, but if there’s another option, I would take it. The front desk guy (Dennis) was very helpful and accommodating.

title: Perfect location, great hotel.
review: Dear LaShawn J,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay. I am truly disappointed that this is your impression of our hotel. This is certainly not the norm, and I am extremely regretful we were not able to exceed your expectations during your past stay, as this is what we strive for!  Please feel free to contact me directly to discuss exactly the details of you stay, so we can take the proper corrective measures.   Sincerely, Mary Apple  General Manager

title: Fort Lauderdale Boat Show
review: My husband and I stayed her for two nights prior to a Cruise, it was the perfect start to our holiday, the beach is just across the road, restaurants and bars just a short walk away. We had a sea view room. Check in was quick all staff were pleasant and very helpful, the Concierge organized the transfer to our departure Port. I would most certainly stay here again.

title: Very good
review: We stayed at this Marriott hotel while attending the annual Fort Lauderdale boat show. The hotel is located a short 15 minute cab ride from the show and has all the amenities you would expect from a Marriott property. The staff were very friendly and helpful, the room clean and well maintained. The breakfast each morning was freshly made and the coffee (very important) was excellent. I would recommend this hotel and definitely stay here again

title: Nice and clean near the airport
review: As a group of 6 people staying here in October, we had a great time in the hotel. Nice rooms, good service from the reception staff, the concierge, the restaurant staff, all really helpful and friendly.  Good amenities and really well located.  Only downside I would comment on would be the swimming pool area, which is in need of an upgrade.

title: Great place to Stay! The Location and staff are outstanding!
review: This hotel's staff gives off a vibe of old school hospitality, its as if you were in a country inn instead of in the middle of a bustling metropolis.  The rooms are updated, very comfortable and quiet.  So quiet I was surprised to see all the cars in the morning because I didn't hear a peep. It is convenient in and out to a plenty of parking lot.  Location is perfect!  Go to Umberto's 1 mile east on Commercial for incredible pizza and Italian food and next door to Pomperdale's NY Deli (it is the real deal) and hit the Egg and You for breakfast. There is a frig so stock it up at Whole Foods a few miles to the south on US 1.  Then head to the beach!!!!!!!!

title: Awesome Stay!
review: My sister and I stayed here this past weekend and we had an awesome stay. The free shuttle within 3 miles of the hotel was a huge plus; The drivers were all so friendly. The pool is nice and clean and we were able to see an iguana during our stay. We grabbed drinks at the bar each night and took them to the pool with us and ate one night also at the Bistro. The rooms were clean and comfortable. We were very pleased with our stay and all of the staff!

title: A Nice Place Close to Everything
review: We needed a two-night stay this past summer with no time to plan, and this Courtyard by Marriott was a very pleasant surprise. The room was very clean and very highly-styled with contemporary decoration and all the modern necessities. But, what really made the stay wonderful was the staff. A terrific young man at the front desk went above and beyond to help us when we needed to print boarding passes. The breakfast that you buy at a McDonald's-type counter was good, as well, and, here again, the staff made the difference. Although it's a few minutes drive to the beach areas, I will stay here again for a longer period of time since the short stay was really nice.

title: Decent hotel - great staff
review: The hotel was decent, a little out dated and difficult to get in and out of.  The restaurant next door was closed.  The grounds were small.  But the pool was nice.  The highlight of the hotel was the staff. Everyone at the front desk, the restaurant, and Even the housecleaning personnel were kind and seemed genuinely happy I chose their hotel.  And on the days that I did not need housekeeping service they still left a bag with additional towels on the door which was much appreciated and something that not many hotels do.   Loved it.     I travel often for business and would stay again.

title: Nice but drinking glasses hidden in the closet
review: Selected this hotel because of its proximity to Coral Springs Presbyterian Church, where we were attending a concert. It was so close we could have walked. They also have a free shuttle. Staff was nice. Room was nice, bed was very comfortable. It took me a while to find the drinking glasses, which were in the clothes closet along with the coffee machine. That was a first for me. Rooms have balconies, but that doesn't mean a view. Rooms are in a separate building from the office and food service, but only steps away. Doors operated by key card. My key cards were finicky, or maybe it was me. Parking is free, but they warn you to remove "everything" from your vehicle. Didn't use the pool but it looked nice. I would be happy to stay here again if I need to be in the area.

title: Nice
review: Hotel offers transportation to and from Fort Lauderdale /Hollywood Airport  Check in is fast and efficient  lobby have a small cafe  Quick bites.  Sandwiches/flatbread pizzas/burgers/ fruits and soft drinks    If you forgot personal hygiene items - they are available for purchase at the front desk   Rooms are comfortable - they each gave a refrigerator and coffee maker.    Ice machine on each floor.     Hotel is close to the Port for Cruise ships.

title: Good stay
review: I had booked this for 2 nights before we drove down to Miami. The rooms were nice and the staff were very polite. Overall, shower worked, bed was soft, and internet worked real well. As this is a late review, I am unsure if this hotel had Netflix. We stayed at a different branch in Miami after our cruise.   Would stay here again since it's close to the airport if needed to.

title: A very good place to stay but far from city center
review: We stayed in Courtyard by Marriott Fort Lauderdale East during our Miami visit. The rooms are big, with balcony. The beds are very comfortable. The rooms are very clean and room service works very fine. The room rates are reasonable. Since it is a branch of a hotel chain, there is a standard in every service. In our room rate, breakfast was not included, but there is a small restaurant where you can have your breakfast and there are too many choices (and also Starbucks coffee). The staff is very friendly, they help you to choose if you are hesitant. If you want to try the local tastes, the receptionists will help you. They come up with very good suggestions. There are computers in the lobby that you can use for free, you can also print out, which helped us a lot before our…

title: Stay here
review: Well, the room was just as good as the photos, it was clean, neat, location was great. You'll also be able to use a shuttle that takes you to an from the beach or anywhere within a two mile radius. The staff are great, went over an above in their care an helpfulness. The restaurants around are great. It's in the perfect spot. If I'm nit picking, the only thing that was slightly wired was there wasn't much choice on the TV station but again that's really nit picking.

title: Perfect!!!
review: This hotel is beyond amazing.  It's location is great, rooms are extremely clean and spacious, staff is over the top friendly. We arrived a bit early, but we were able to use the pool while we waited. Property grounds are well kept as well as pool and spa. Highly recommend.

title: Hotel
review: Verry neat and Nice hotel good located. Breakfast was Ok not to big But Ok. There is Also an pool clean and save for childeren.  Staff are verry helpfull and proffesional. Car Parking hs lot of space and nearby you can find restaurants like macdonald and Dunkin donuts

title: Dirty room
review: The hotel is new but management is awful. Dirty room with a lot of things over the carpet and restroom (please look at the pictures). When traveling all people deserve a minimum of quality and this hotel doesn't achieve this. Spring bed is one of the worst I ever had. The only positive thing was the space of the room. Air conditioning control broken and impossible to regulate.

title: Good location, clean Marriott quality
review: Dear Roberto D,  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you! I am truly disappointed that you experienced a cleanliness issue in your room. This is certainly not the norm, and I am extremely regretful we were not able to exceed your expectations during your past stay, as this is what we strive for!  Please feel free to contact me directly to discuss exactly the details of you stay, so we can take the proper corrective measures.   Sincerely, Mary Apple General Manager

title: Great Hotel
review: As other have said, this is a Marriott property, so the cleanliness and comfort standards are high. It is located at the corner of two main routes (Federal HWY and Commercial), which is good for access, but also generates some traffic noise and the turn to the beach can be difficult (cross 4 lanes of oncoming speeding traffic in 100 yards/meters to get to the turn lane). The rooms are clean and comfortable; so are the beds. This is not a quite hotel, however; the hallway and between-room noise level can be quite loud. You hear closing doors, closing drawers and footsteps above clearly.

title: Nice hotel.
review: Dear CaptnGphs,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the comfort and cleanliness of our hotel!  We regret to hear that you were disturbed by both exterior and interior noise. During your next visit please contact us directly prior to your arrival and we will gladly pre-assign you to the quietest area of the hotel.

title: Nice hotel and very nice staff
review: This hotel is just typical of the Marriott properties.  You can never go wrong staying with them.  Super clean rooms, great staff, pretty good location.  Has a pool, bar, and dining room at this location.

title: Visiting Funky Buddah Brewery
review: We were only in town for one night but the hotel was clean, well staffed and had plenty of free parking. The free shuttle was a super plus for getting around. Will stay again the next time we are in the area visiting. Great deal for the price.

title: Nice location, friendly staff
review: This is in a very good location, though it could be a bit confusing when first trying to enter the premises. The staff was wonderful. The woman checking us in was training, but the manager was right there. We were greeted by several of the staff when we entered the building.  We were happy that they checked us in and gave us a room, even though it was early. The hotel is clean. It is nestled in between two busy streets.  The landscaping mostly hides the street but it is a bit noisy at the pool area. Unavoidable and a nice trade off because of the good location.

title: The Courtyard By Marriott in FLL
review: 5)	“The Courtyard by Marriott” was one of two hotels that we stayed at during our latest visit to Fort Lauderdale. This location is located 5001 North Federal Highway. (Route 1) It is located approximately 3 miles from the beach. It is also located across the street from Denny’s Restaurant. If you need an ATM, there is a Bank of America also across the street. As far as the hotel itself is concerned, the rooms are average size. We stayed in a non-smoking, king-size room. The room was very clean, and the staff were very friendly. We stayed at this location once before but after our latest stay, we will have to reevaluate our decision.   During our latest visit there was a problem with the television remote, the telephone in the room, the cable stations, the hot water in our room,…

title: convenient and clean
review: Dear Darryl M,  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you! We are glad to hear you frequently enjoy our location and friendly service. We are so disappointed we were not able to exceed your expectations during your past stay, as this is what we strive for! Next time you are in town, please be sure to let me know so that we can better deliver upon the guest experience you deserve.  Sincerely, Mary Apple

title: Beautiful landscaping
review: Loved the huge iguanas poolside. A little noisy from sirens but would stay again. Too bad the Bistro does not have piña coladas for poolside. Great AC, friendly team members, and if you have the do not disturb sign out-they leave a great bag on your door with fresh towels n toiletries. How smart in that!!

title: Great clean Courtyard ... Traffic not so good
review: Stayed a couple of nights here and although the location was ideal, the room was clean, and the staff were awesome - I wish I had not been given the corner room right above the very busy intersection ... the noise never abated.  I would stay here again but I would ask to be roomed away from the pool.  The staff were awesome, discussing locations for dinner, making good suggestions, and overall just very accommodating.

title: Nice, Clean, Close
review: This hotel has friendly staff comma nice atmosphere, clean hotel rooms, and a spacious bathroom. We did not try out the food at the bistro period our view was satisfactory but nothing to speak highly of. Well it says that it's about a mile from the beach and is probably pretty accurate, don't expect to get there very quickly with the traffic. Overall a very nice experience with a king-size bed and a pull-out couch.

title: Weekend stay
review: Everyone was very nice and very friendly. It was very close to my husbands class during the day, so I was able to go and drive back easily. I like how they put makeup wipes in the bathroom to use. After house keeping turned down the bed the second night they did not pull the pillows back on the bed which I thought was weird, I don't know if they forgot or what. The bed was actually very hard to me but it was good for my husband.The pool is supposed to be heated but it definitely didn't seem to be heated. The hot tub was nice although the chlorine was very strong and it could use a really good cleaning because there was growth at the water line which was pretty nasty. Overall the staff was very nice and we definitely enjoyed our stay.

title: Good look
review: I stayed for one night on business and leisure, good hotel with what I needed, the lobby service is friendly, breakfast is paid, has what it takes and close to the beach, perfect for business.  surely come back

title: Fresh Look
review: We checked in and the staff was pleasant. We previously stayed at this property a few years ago before they renovated it. We were impressed with the new modern look in the hotel. We had quesadillas & shrimp potstickers at the Bistro for dinner. Our meal was tasty and quick, and the quesadilla was sizeable. The rooms were nice and fresh with a balcony facing the pool on the 4th floor. The bed was comfortable with a spacious bathroom. The fitness center was small but air conditioned and modern with tv's. There is also a pool outside (not heated) we didn't use and a hot tub that we enjoyed in the morning. There is also a free shuttle service to the beach area or restaurant (3 mile radius) that was convenient. It took us 35 minutes to get picked up from the beach and two phone calls.

title: Wonderful staff
review: Spent 4 days there on business/leisure.  Spotless hotel, very nice pool.  Shuttle was available within 3 miles.  Close to beach (1 1/2 miles). Most comfortable beds we've ever had at a hotel!  This is including some luxury resorts. Perfect business hotel, and great value for someone who wants to go to the beach, but not spend the money to actually stay on the beach.  Every staff person we encountered was amazing and helpful.  It was a wonderful surprise and we will certainly use his hotel again.

title: Loved the shuttle service!
review: The hotel is located close to the beach by car, not walking.   Upon arrival, we were warmly greeted by Sarah, who made us feel very welcome. She was very friendly. We were recommended to a restaurant on the beach, which I understand is owned by the owner of the hotel. It was fantastic and we were happy to get a free shuttle to the restaurant. Unfortunately, it took more than 30 minutes to get picked up after lunch. We asked to be dropped off at the local mall which is not worth the visit, other than the Target store.  Our room was modern and very clean with a balcony overlooking the pool area. I was very happy with the comfort of the room.   The "happy hour" in the hotel is disappointing. Drinks were only $1 off the regular price. We were looking to have some appetizers since…

title: Nice Hotel, Good Value
review: Good hotels in Ft Lauderdale are a bit pricey, but this hotel was more reasonable and still close to the beach, shopping, and restaurants. A shuttle is available to drive you within 3 mile area.  Rooms have a modern touch with comfortable beds and spacious bathrooms. A small bar and restaurant are located in lobby area and serve good drinks, appetizers, and lunch or dinner. Rooms have a small balcony ( especially nice if you get a pool view room). We stayed here night before leaving on a cruise and were only a 30 minute drive to the terminal.

title: Great stay for one night
review: The hotel is located in a non-discrete street location; however, it is close enough to the beach (about a mile), and the free shuttle service helps to compensate for the location.  The lobby is located in one building which also include the hotel food service facilities, and the rooms in an adjacent building.   The rooms are typical Courtyard. The room is comfortable but not big, with decent shower and bathroom. Our balcony was pointing to the parking lot and back street. The room itself shows its age and probably a face lift will be needed soon.  Where the hotel really shines is the staff. From the front desk staff to the servers at the food selling facility (as a Courtyard it does not really have a restaurant) – all went above and beyond to make the stay great. This is one of…

title: Clean, liked the design!
review: I really liked the design of the hotel as it was different than other Courtyards I have stayed at. Staff were all friendly. The room was large. While I have not encountered any problems with cleanliness as the Marriott properties that I have stayed at, this one was one of the cleanest I have stayed at. The front desk area, the pool area, the room, no matter where I went, I could not believe how clean it was. The location is great and their free shuttle is an added bonus. A very good place to stay in Fort Lauderdale.

title: Finally!!
review: Finally! The first property I've ever stayed in where I can select the temperature to the 50 degree range and it actually delivers!! I sleep very well when the room is cold and I'm buried under the duvet. My colleague came in for a visit and was so cold she had to crawl into bed. Love it!  Room was very clean with two double beds, a desk, small refrigerator. Spacious closet and bath. Staff were very helpful, particularly when I experienced difficulty in printing documents for the day's assignment.   Several dining venues are within walking distance as is a CVS Pharmacy, just across the street.    Traffic is terrible and exiting onto the main road was always a challenge regardless of time of day.

title: Great hotel, great location
review: Beautiful hotel located just a mile from Lauderdale on the beach.  We took their complimentary shuttle on nye for a fabulous evening.   We opted to walk off libations and dinner by walking back to hotel.   I would highly recommend the courtyard Ft Lauderdale east.

title: Good place to stay for some days
review: Having a small balcony was quite nice after two weeks in motels around florida. Liked that there has been a Starbucks located in the lobby. Location was directly at a highly frequented street .. Nice people working there. Was def one of the best places to stay at a good price.

title: A Good Stay Again
review: Although there is room for improvement, we think this is a very good place to stay if you want somewhere low key and clean. We have stayed here several times because we know it is reliable and quiet. There are not a lot of kids, mostly older adults and lots of business travellers. We had a great room again, quiet, on the top floor, just what we asked for. The rooms are a good size and same for the bathroom.   The free shuttle is such a big plus. I just wish it was available longer hours. It only runs till 930 pm, too early to come back from dinner. We took uber back to the hotel a few times, when it was too late for the shuttle. However it is great that the shuttle will take you within a 3 mile radius of the hotel, giving guests quite a bit of choice as to where they can go. We…

title: Courtyard Fort Lauderdale FL
review: We stayed there earlier this year so knowing the area we decided to book there again for a night. The check-in was smooth and quick and was even given an upgrade which was a very nice touch. This hotel is located near a shopping center and restaurants. Would recommend!

title: Average
review: Rooms are average and overlook the busy highway so you always hear the buzz of traffic and trucks. Pool sits right on highway. Bathroom was very clean so that was best part of room. Breakfast is very early and ends at 930a. Staff very nice. They offer a free shuttle to anywhere w/i a 3 mile radius which is really a great perk. There were some shady people staying here and that was a little odd. We only stayed here because we had a free night. Wouldn't stay again.

title: Pleasant holiday stay
review: Dear LoveAtFirstSight13,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts. I am so happy that you enjoyed the convenience of our local shuttle. It really is a great way to get around town. I would like to apology that you were disturbed by the surrounding noise from the street. I can imagine that this must have been frustrating when you were trying to get some rest. All of our rooms are equipped with thick hurricane proof balcony doors, which considerably mitigate any exterior sound, but they are not completely sound proof. Next time you are in town, please be sure to let me know and I will do everything possible to assign you the quietest room in the hotel!   Sincerely, Mary Apple General Manager

title: Great Experience
review: A very nice, very affordable way to visit Fort Lauderdale. Very clean and well managed. The restaurant was nice and not expensive. The motel is on a busy street so it can get noisy. The complimentary shuttle is a plus because while the hotel is centrally located, it is reall not within walking distance of anything. All in all, this is a great value and highly recommended.

title: average hotel
review: What a great experience. My wife and I stayed here for 2 nights. It all started with my initial call to Caroline who was very pleasant and  most helpful in making my reservation to Shelby who checked us in and explained the hotel. Mary the General manager greeted  us with a warm welcome and asked us if there was anything she could do for us. The room was clean. Everyone was very pleasant. We will certainly be back.   Thanks again,   AC

title: Nice Courtyard Marriott
review: I stayed here for one night before heading to the Wyndham Palm Aire Resort. It is your typical Courtyard hotel. Room was clean and we enjoyed the pool for a few hours. It was nice to be have the concierge arrange a shuttle to take us to dinner at the nearby Chart House restaurant. Shuttle runs until 9:30. We took an Uber back. I will have to say I don't like how the shower flooded in the handicapped accessible room we were given. Overall I would stay again.

title: Really nice hotel
review: Dear AisaLyn11,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts about your stay. We are so pleased to hear that you found our complimentary shuttle, rooms, and pool area enjoyable. We are, however, so sorry to hear that your shower flooded in the accessible room. Please accept our most sincerely apologies. We thank you for the opportunity to serve you and hope to see you during your next visit to Fort Lauderdale!  Sincerely, Mary Apple General Manager

title: Holding double the cost due to 2 separate pre-authorizations
review: On arrival the reception team at this hotel were so nice and friendly. A special thank you to Shelby who has made our stay here so nice. We ended up staying two night in the end. The pool is lovely with a lovely spa pool for at the end of the day. The breakfast was so good - a great way to start the day. Thank you to all the team here your managers should be very proud of you all Xx

title: Bugs
review: I recently stayed at Courtyard by Marriott Ft Lauderdale Beach East. Upon arrival they pre-authorized 420 dollars. 351 for the cost of the stay and the remaining amount for incidentals. My stay was September 3rd through September 6th. I checked out yesterday then flew to Costa Rica. I attempted to pay for my lodging in Costa Rica and my transaction was declined. I looked at my bank account balance and noticed that the hotel pre-authorized another 351 dollars leaving me with 40 dollars in my account. They did this prior to releasing the initial 420 dollar pre-authorization. This is a total of 770 dollars of my money on hold that I have no ability to access. Due to this ridiculous business practice I have been left stranded in a foreign country with no ability to access my money…

title: Clean and Ideal
review: Dear Charles W B,  We are very sorry that you experienced an issue with merchant services holding authorization on your account during your international travels. I can certainly understand and empathize with your frustration in the matter. Based on our direct contact offline, we have contacted your bank and merchant services to provide appropriate documentation validating the single charge we placed on your account. Please do not hesitate to contact me directly if I may be of further assistance.   Sincerely, Mary Apple General Manager

title: Very clean and comfortable,
review: I highly recommend this hotel.  It is not large, which I liked but the rooms are very spacious with all the amenities you need and quiet.  The bed was very comfortable.  This hotel is just a mile from the beach at Lauderdale by the sea. And easy access to I-95.  The grounds were groomed perfectly and the pool was very nice with nice chair and tables. There is a complimentary business center if you need to use the computers and the staff were very nice too.  I would stay again.

title: Fabulous stay
review: We stayed as a family for 5 days and even though we arrived way too earlier the hotel managed to get us a room pretty quick. The free shuttle which drives in limited radius is terrific it can bring you up and down to the beach and some good restaurants nearby.  The beds are excellent. The staff is very friendly and helpful on answering any question.  Even though I felt absolutely safe in the hotel a in room locker/safe would be a must have in nowadays world.  I for sure would visit this hotel again and I also would recommend the hotel to others as it offers value for money.

title: Nice Clean Room
review: My family and I have stayed here before. It is not a top tier hotel but it is clean and very nice. The beds were once again comfy and the staff very pleasant. If I had one complaint it would be that being a rewards member and requesting a early check in at a specific time (in all fairness they do say they can not guarantee the time) and then arriving and not getting a room for more than 2 hours is frustrating. I was told the hotel was totally booked...and I get that but if I made my reservations with the request, got an email confirmation of my stay and even used the app to do the app early check in it seems like somewhere within all of this technology they would be able to determine that the place is packed and there is no way I will get my room at that time and to let me know…

title: Great Courtyard slightly different design
review: Dear Senseiblackburn,  Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts about your stay.  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the comfort of our rooms as well as the service you received from our staff. We greatly appreciate you being a loyal Marriott Rewards Member! We are truly sorry that we were unable to accommodate your early arrival request, and completely understand your frustration. Please know that we do everything we can to grant special requests and are truly disappointed when we can't accede. Again, please accept our most sincerely apologies.  We thank you for the opportunity to serve you and hope to see you during your next visit to Fort Lauderdale!     Kindest regards,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Great Location and Service
review: This courtyard is very clean first of all.  Secondly the rooms are very well done and spacious. The bathroom is large and has a shower only unit which is awesome. The lobby is separate from the rooms tower.. But still has a great Courtyard feel and features. The staff was very friendly and very helpful   Location is right on Federal Highway and close to a number of restaurants and a Starbucks

title: NICE CLEAN HOTEL WITH EXCELLENT LOCATION!
review: I checked in on July 2nd and found plenty of room for parking. The check-in process was very smooth and the front desk staff was kind and helpful. There was a nice large clean pool which unfortunately I did not have time to use. My room was very clean with everything in working order. The location of the hotel was good with many restaurants nearby. Overall excellent stay!

title: What you expect from a Courtyard
review: Dear Mafia1969,   We are so happy to hear that you had an excellent stay with us!   We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. We have shared your comments with the front desk staff, as they truly appreciate the recognition.  We hope that you choose to come visit us again when your travels bring you back to Fort Lauderdale!     Warmest Regards, Mary Apple General Manager

title: Great hotel for the price!
review: My wife has been here all week for business. The staff are all very friendly and helpful. The room is nice and we'll maintained.  Pool looks nice but I didn't use it as we were out exploring the beaches.

title: Typical Courtyard you get what you expect
review: Dear Robert F,   Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We are glad to hear that you received helpful and friendly service from our staff.  They all work very hard and appreciate the recognition. We are also so pleased to hear that you able to take advantage of our great location and were able to enjoy the beautiful local beaches.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon!   Kind Regards, Mary Apple  General Manager

title: Awesome time Again
review: My family and I stayed here in june for a quick night stay before we headed to Miami and Key West. The accommodations are great and you cant beat the price. We had 5 people and if they didnt have room for everybody they offered to give us a free room to accommodate us! I dont believe you can go wrong with this hotel for the price.

title: Great Hotel
review: The hotel is centrally located. Friendly staff and most important to us, very clean. The rooms are spacious . The only thing missing in the room is a safe box. Can't wait to go back,we had a great weekend. Great value.

title: Good 3-4 star hotel
review: Needed a cheap hotel to spend the night because I was coming in late and did not want to check in to my more expensive beachfront hotel for just a few hour sleep. I did inconvenience myself but I thought it was worth the savings. The hotel is on route 1, the road that goes from New England to Florida and is a commercial road. The hotel has free parking. It was clean and the staff was very polite. the room was large and clean. No tub, but I never use one, but the shower was nice and large. Free internet which worked well. No free breakfast but had a "restaurant" for food and a 24 hours snack market. Did not use the pool or the gym but looked standard. I think that this hotel delivered on what it is. For a reasonable price you get a clean hotel room with some nice benefits (wifi,…

title: Great hotel,value for money and staff very helpful
review: We arrived four hours early to drop off our bags and the staff let us check in early, room was very nice with a gorgeous view, pool was clean and a nice spa, gym was ok could have been bigger overall hotel was very nice and never had a problem parking on our return from our days out, will return

title: Homey
review: There were 6 of us, and we stayed there a week. Rooms nice size, bed comfortable, bathroom modern, lot of counter space. Scenery around hotel not much to look at, so preferred pool side, which was nicely decorated, but location well worth the trade off, near restaurants, mall, theater and beach. Bistro in lobby nice and had Starbucks coffee. Denny's was across the street.  Hotel very accommodating, will shuttle you within 3 miles of hotel(beach, mall), great for us as son-in-law wanted to play golf(which was close and he said was reasonable).  Able to print boarding passes in lobby.  Just about everyone were kind and helpful.  Only things I think would make it better is microwave in rooms and more channels on tv.

title: Great room, great pool, great staff
review: The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. It was pretty quite on our floor. The front desk staff was courteous and very quick to respond. They brew Starbucks brand coffee in the breakfast area (not a free perk...get it? perk?). Definitely a good value for the area. The pool was nice and clean. Plenty of towels and chairs. We rented a car so didn't take advantage of the shuttle but seemed convenient.

title: Great Comfortable Room
review: The room is spacious and very comfortable.  Bed was very comfortable and bathroom was large and lots of counterspace for toiletries.  The staff was very helpful and pleasant.  The only drawback was the Lobby and bistro was a separate building from rooms...  So you had to leave your building and walk in the rain or heat to get to bistro or lobby. The decor of room, hallways and lobby were modern and very clean.

title: Surprising gem!
review: We needed a place close to this area for personal reasons and were pleasantly surprised by how modern and affordable the place was.  It's a unique "pod" design, where the rooms are in a separate building from the lobby/eating area, but there's a covered walkway between buildings.  The rooms are quiet and well kept.  My only complaint was the A/C seemed to have a mind of its own and blow colder or warmer than what the temperature reading showed -- I never quite figured out how to get it adjusted to a comfortable temp.

title: Take advantage of the shuttle
review: We stayed here for 2 nights during an extended layover so we could experience Fort Lauderdale and enjoy the beach. The shuttle was very useful as it was able to take us to and from the hotel whenever we needed. The staff were all really helpful and nice. But this was the second Marriott we stayed at during this trip that didn't have great sound insulation! The bathroom was a little small but good enough.

title: Great Service with Shuttle
review: My wife and I stayed here just one night prior to a cruise.  The facility and hotel room were ok - everything seemed clean enough.  What stood out was the fantastic service from the shuttle driver.  We appreciated that the hotel has the free shuttle to beach area and restaurants which we took advantage of during our stay.  As it turned out, we accidentally left one of our cell phones on the shuttle.  When we called the hotel, they said the driver would check on it and leave at the front desk.  Instead he found it in the back of the shuttle and made a special trip and tracked us down at the restaurant we were at.  Great service (I think the driver was Donald)!

title: Exceptional customer service
review: I have stayed here many times and I am never disappointed.  The staff at both the front desk and the Bistro are welcoming and helpful, courteous and efficient.  The rooms are adequate with a very comfortable bed and a lot of desk space.  The on site shuttle is a nice plus when you don't have far to go (within 3 miles) and you don't want to deal with traffic or parking.

title: My First Negative Experience at a Marriott
review: I must start by saying I am a very loyal Marriott customer: have been so for many, many years. I do not recall ever having written a negative review of a Marriott property. In fact, the Marriott properties would be my first choice in any city around the world, from Singapore to Florida. On entering the lobby of this hotel, my wife and I felt like we entered a freezer. The temperature was so low that it was unbearable. And it was not that warm outside: why this low setting?? And we did not know the rooms are in an adjacent building not accessible by elevator in the same building as the front desk. We had to drag our bags through an exterior pathway and courtyard to the building next door, entered with a key card, before taking the elevator to our 4th floor room, without help from…

title: Awesome service and great hotel.
review: Dear Samuel L,   We greatly appreciate your time in reviewing our property. I am terribly sorry to hear the temperature of your room and common areas caused you discomfort. Our thermostats are preset at 75 Degrees in an effort to maintain a climate that is comfortable to the majority of our guests. I just wish we would have known about the issue, as our maintenance team would have been happy to assist in adjusting the room temperature to your desire.  I have shared your valuable comments with them to reiterate presets are routinely monitored and adjusted if necessary. As you mentioned, we are certainly unique in that our lobby and rooms are located in separate buildings. During times of inclement weather we encourage guests to utilize the covered walkway in between buildings.  Since Courtyard is a select service brand featuring the essentials for business and leisure travel there normally isn't a designated bellman on staff. Nonetheless, we are of course glad to assist with your luggage - or anything else -  upon request. We thank you for the opportunity to serve you and hope you consider giving us another chance during your next visit to Fort Lauderdale.   Kindest regards,  Mary Apple

title: CLEAN, QUIET, PAMPERED
review: This place is awesome!! Free WiFi. The rooms are nicely decorated and super clean!  The rooms are equipped with all amenities, iron, ironing board, blow dryer, coffee pot with coffee, and refrigerator. Nicely appointed and clean bathroom. The beds and pillows are the most comfortable we have ever slept on. The staff is at the top of their  game, they are helpful and courteous. The Rooms are cleaned daily, sheets are changed upon request. We requested more towels and they were delivered to our room within 5 minutes. The pool and hot tub are very clean and temperatures are just right.

title: AWESOME
review: We are very particular people and the hotel was perfect in accommodations. There was myself, husband, and 16 yr old and the rooms were very clean, and they literally ran any extra amenities up to our room. The beds and pillows were so comfy we are trying to purchase the same. As quiet as you can get and this was during spring and easter break. I also asked that they put us in a quieter location. They have shuttles to the beach which we didnt know untli we left (not an issue as we had a rental car) and they have a small bistro and coffee shop which is adequate. Expensive concessions ($5.25/beer 12 oz) but ok. Staff is very nice.

title: Great hotel
review: Dennis was amazing.  I got terribly lost on my way to the hotel.  I can assure you I called the hotel 15 times and he never made me feel like I was bothering him.  Truly exceptional especially because upon arrival to the hotel I could see he was working short handed!!!!   Nixon was also great actually everyone was great!!!!   my whole experience was great!!!   I will definitely use their hotel again.   Oh and by the way loved the bed, very comfy!!!!!!!

title: Great place!
