review: Great hotel in a great location! Rooms and the pool were clean, the employees were very nice. There are a lot of stores/restaurants near the hotel and it is a nice driving distance from the beach. I would definitely stay here again and recommend to others!

title: Quick Overnight Trip
review: Dear destinylynae,  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us!  It is really nice to see you got the chance to enjoy the area attractions. Thank you very much for your sharing your wonderful comments!  Your feedback will be shared with the team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. We are looking forward to serving you again soon.  Sincerely, Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Loud area
review: I used this hotel for a quick overnight trip to Ft. Lauderdale. The location seemed weird however the hotel was clean and friendly, the rooms were nice and the staff was extremely customer oriented. I would stay here again for another overnight trip but not for a family vacation in the Fort Lauderdale area. If you are going for business the hotel would work perfectly.

title: Bugs in room!!!!
review: Dear KMS2009  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you! We greatly appreciate the time you took to review our hotel. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the comfort of our rooms as well as the service you received from our staff. I am disappointed that you felt the location did not fit the needs of your family on an overnight trip to Fort Lauderdale. Next time you are in town, I invite you to contact me as I would welcome the opportunity to recommend some of the wonderful family oriented attractions in the area!   We hope to have the pleasure of accommodating you again in the near future!   Kindest regards,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Enjoyable One-Night Stay
review: Friendly staff.  Clean rooms.  It appears as the hotel is under some updating. Pool area is nice but the area isn't the best. Lots of road noise and not a lot of things in the area unless you don't mind walking. The beach is a little over a mile .  Typical courtyard in my opinion. Don't think I would stay here with family....

title: Good location, good price
review: This was a last minute reservation, and was better than expected. Convenient location very close to the beach. Free parking! They also have a free shuttle that will take you to and from the beach. Very friendly and helpful staff. Room was clean and comfortable. Would stay here again.

title: Enjoyed our 1 night stay
review: Room was nice, clean, and exactly what we expected. Staff was better than pleasant. On site restaurant was small with limited menu, but our food was cooked properly so no complaints. Free shuttle within a 3 mile radius, but the airport shuttle they arranged was $35. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Overnight Stay Prior to Cruise
review: This was our second stay at this hotel prior to a cruise the next day.  The hotel is about 10 miles North of the cruise port but we stay here because the price is lower than most of the hotels near the cruise port.  We usually rent a car prior to the cruise but this time we had our own car.  The Courtyard had everything we needed for a pleasant overnight stay.  A friendly greeting when we arrived and a nice room near the elevators for convenience.  The hotel does have a restaurant on site but we opted to go out of the hotel for dinner.  Unlike Marriott Fairfield and Springhill hotels, Courtyard's do not offer a free breakfast.  We like the location of this hotel because it is close to a number of very good restaurants.

title: Good Quality Hotel
review: Dear Rudy C Thank you very much for your loyalty and for your lovely and accurate review. Would love to know what your favorite restaurant in the area is! Sea Watch, perhaps?  We hope you enjoyed your cruise and are looking forward to serving you again soon!  Kindest regards,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Great Place to Stay
review: I stayed at this Courtyard, the staff is very friendly, the rooms were clean and in good shape, the breakfast was good, free parking and Wifi. Perfect for travelling, no surprises. There is a CVS right Accross the street, so in many ways a full service hotel

title: Convinient, Clean, Comfortable
review: We visited this hotel as we were attending a beer festival at Funky Buddha. The hotel was a great price! It was clean, comfortable, and the staff very friendly. We needed a rollaway bed for one night and they brought it to our room right away and there was no extra charge. The hotel also provided van service within a 3 mile radius which was very convenient as it was close enough to the brewery. Free Parking was also a plus. Bed was comfortable and they provided plenty of linens and towels. Overall a great place for a couple of nights. No Complaints.

title: Great little hotel!
review: Dear Rolando A, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us and for your excellent review! We are pleased to hear you had a wonderful experience and that you visited a small/local business while in town! We hope to have the pleasure of accommodating you again in the near future. Kindest regards, Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Sketchy
review: We stayed here on Christmas Day as a stop off between Miami and Kissimmee. We were greeted at reception by a very friendly chap who still had his sense of humour despite having to work on Christmas Day! Our room was on the ground floor opposite the very well equipped small gym. The room was great - plenty of space plus a small patio area outside. We had a couple of drinks and some dinner in the bistro - all very acceptable. All in all a great hotel!

title: A hidden gem!  Great place to stay!
review: The hotel has a decent appearance but there were bums nearby and a security or police car in the lot right next door. The person checking us in was friendly enough and there is a little closet thing by the front desk with hot and cold food you can purchase. A little pricey but we didn't want to risk going back out again. The room smelled like mildew covered up with air freshener. We had to ask 3 times for pillows for the sofa bed. The bed comfort wasn't bad but I didn't sleep well wondering if there had ever been a dead body here lol They do a decent job trying to secure the building by having to use the key to get inside but my son was able to open the door from outside without using the key. Air conditioner worked fine and bathroom was clean and good sized. We tried to eat at…

title: Like home away from home
review: Dear Pamela M We are crushed to read your review. Please accept our most sincere apologies for not providing you with the perfect experience you deserve. There are, of course, many factors that we cannot control, however, it seems that on the ones we could we dropped the ball. Please know that this is certainly not the norm. I would welcome the opportunity speak with you regarding your experience as my goal is to do everything possible to ensure our guests have a positive memory of our hotel.  Warmest wishes for the New Year!  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Brief Two Night Stay
review: Courtyard's are consistently very good and this hotel lives up to those standards. I had business at the nearby hospital and it is a just a block or two away. The  Courtyard is also convenient to most anything else you might need while visiting.  While the hotel doesn't have a grand lobby or rooms with ocean views, it does have very comfortable beds, large showers and vanities, clean rooms, good Wi-Fi and a very cordial and competent staff. That is always appreciated after a long day of travel or work.  My only complaint is a very small one - there are not enough outlets around the work area for my various electronic devices. Certainly not a deal breaker.

title: Clean, Friendly, and near to many attractions
review: We recently stayed four days at this Mariott while I attended a conference across town.  I must commend the staff for providing for us what turned out to be a most memorable stay.  David at the front desk was happy to make all of our dining arrangements and made available the shuttle bus which will get you to about anywhere you want to go for just a phone call to the front desk.  The hotel's bistro was staffed by Matt, Marcella, and Mr. Dyckes and they never failed to be friendly and their food was excellent.  Our bed was clean, the showers were spotless, and the hotel in general, was well kept, even though it was originally built in the late 1940's.  I am returning to Fort Lauderdale soon and I have already made reservations to stay here as I don't think I could find better…

title: Nice Lobby and Pool
review: Dear David I Oh my! You just made our day! Thank you very much for such a lovely review. I have shared it with our team, and we are all thrilled. It just warms our hearts to hear what a wonderful experience you had with us.  It is a pleasure to serve you and we are excited you are coming back to stay with us soon. Warmest wishes until then, Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Relocate Kids
review: I only spent one night here but I enjoyed the hotel.  There is a buffet area in the lobby that looks very nice, but I did not manage to get to it either in the evening or morning.  The pool was warm and clean and I enjoyed few laps in the morning.  My room was large and clean.  The shower was large.  The bed was very comfortable.  My only complaint was that the room had a bit of a musty smell....either an AC issue or no one had opened the patio door in some time.    I wish I could have stayed longer.  The location is great....on Federal Highway going north / south and only about a 10 minute drive to the water.  Ideal for both business or holiday travelers who don't need to be on the beach.  There is a Denny's right across the street for dining at anytime.  There is also free…

title: One Little Problem
review: Room was very good - clean. Could have used a micro wave. Beds were very comfortable for sleeping. Nice shower facilities - large, plush towels. Key pass did not work sometime. Lobby and pool were nice. A continental breakfast would have been nice. Staff were both helpful and courteous. Should have communicated on water advisory sooner, but provided unlimited "free" bottle water. In-hotel purchased groceries were very expensive. Sometimes were out of towel pools - probably because some guests took them to the beach. Overall enjoyed my stay and would stay there again - convenient location for both many services.

title: Nice hotel
review: Check in was easy and the clerk was friendly. Room was clean, spacious and modern. Shower was nice. Lobby was nice and quiet and the pool looked clean. Lots of parking. Really cant find anything wrong at all.

title: No Complaints!
review: Dear Seevert, Well, we can’t find anything wrong with your Five Star review either! We very much appreciate it!  Thank you for choosing our Courtyard Fort Lauderdale East.  We are looking forward to your next great stay with us.   Warmest regards,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Newly renovated, nice
review: Very clean hotel with plenty of free parking. Comfortable beds and convenient to restaurants and interstate. Beach access about a mile away. The pool was clean with plenty of fresh towels. Staff treated us like family. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Nice Trip!
review: Stayed here years ago and it was "ok." Now quite nice: hallways clean and bright. Rooms newly redone and very comfortable - new beds, TV, bathroom, large closet. Nice cheap place for business stay; good restaurants nearby; ocean 1 mile away. Enjoy!

title: Great Location.
review: We stayed at this hotel four 5 nights and everything was wonderful.  The rooms are spacious, clean, and newly renovated. We stayed in a King with a sofa bed and there was more than enough room. The staff is very accommodating and the food here is delicious, our children even enjoyed it! The pool area is clean and the pool towels are always stocked.  We did not encounter any problems at all.  The shops and beach are not in walking distance, but not far away either, about a 7-10 minute ride. We will definitely stay here again.

title: All Courtyard Marriots are not made the same
review: I had stayed at a Courtyard Marriot on Sunday prior to my cruise and enjoyed it so I booked another two days stay for Wednesday and Friday night in this Courtyard Marriot. At check in I enquired about a microwave and was told that there was none in the rooms but there was one in an alcove by the front desk that had snacks, juice and microwaveable items like mac n' cheese and soup and there were also items from Starbucks and all these could be purchased from the front desk. This was a damper on my stay as I was told by the Courtyard I stayed in that Monday that all rooms had a microwave and so I assumed that it would be the same here. I would not have booked these rooms if I had known that all Courtyard Marriot's were not created equally.   The grounds and pool areas are well…

title: Wonderful Surprise in a Local Courtyard by Marriott
review: Dear angelaf5310,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  You are absolutely right! Even though there are many amenities that are Courtyard brand standard, such as Complimentary Wi-Fi, the various hotels have some flexibility as to what they will offer to better suit their guests, based on location, demographics, as well as other factors.  We understand the convenience of having a microwave close, especially when nurturing a baby. Even though we don’t have microwaves in every room, we do have a few on hand that we gladly provide to our guests. I apologize they were all taken during your stay.  I feel terrible about the misconception about the brand. To avoid this from happening in the future, I suggest at the time of making a reservation, asking the hotel specific questions about their amenities to ensure they will meet you needs.   Thank you for your compliment on our grounds and linens. Glad you enjoyed them! We are pleased to share that our balcony furniture order is in process and we are expecting it soon!  If your travels bring you to the Fort Lauderdale Area again, please don’t hesitate to contact me so that I can do everything in my power to make your stay a very enjoyable one.  Sincerely,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Very Nice
review: Recently closed on a condo in Ft. Lauderdale, and we needed a place to stay in the neighborhood until our beds arrived.  This was a very pleasant surprise, as this hotel had everything we needed-it was very clean, had a helpful and pleasant staff, had a quieter building off U.S. 1 that was private and sedate, and served a very nice breakfast in the front building.  It also had a pool, for those interested. We would wholeheartedly recommend this Marriott for anyone wanting to stay in the Coral Ridge section of Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Business trip
review: Dear mangiabene48, Congratulations on your new home! Hope your beds are super comfortable! Thank you so much for your lovely review!  It is always nice to hear when guests have a great experience. Even though now you are a “local”, please feel free to stop in to have a Starbucks Coffee or a cocktail at The Bistro. Please do not hesitate to let us know if we can be of any assistance while you get settled into the area.  Best wishes, Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Great stay!
review: Stayed for the weekend and had a very lovely experience.  The room was clean and the way the hotel is set u, you need your key card to get into each building which is great security. The breakfast was very good and the pool area was very clean. It is located on a very busy street but our room was very quiet. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Poolside oasis just steps away from major highway
review: We had the pleasure of staying at the hotel while our daughter had an emergency stay at the Holy Cross Hospital. When we first arrived at the hotel, the staff were friendly, cheerful and very helpful. We meet many wonderful people who made our traumatic stay in fort Lauderdale a very positive experience. Each morning, we started our day with a breakfast from the grill that was prepared with fresh ingredients and cooked with that down home loving feeling. A cool refreshing cup of  free strawberry water made our warm daily trip to the hospital a breeze. In the evening we returned to the poolside oasis of tropical palms which were just steps away from the daily traffic of the cars. A clean pool and spotless poolside courtyard allowed us to relax and enjoy a beverage at the end of a…

title: Pre-Cruise Stay
review: Dear Thom & Wilma, Your kind words just warmed our hearts. Thank you! It is our out most pleasure to serve our guests and do everything possible to make their stay as enjoyable as possible, especially through strenuous circumstances. We hope your daughter is quickly recovering. Please send her our warmest wishes.   Thank you again for sharing your thoughts! We are looking forward to welcoming you back, but next time for more positive reasons.  Best regards,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Comfortable and relaxing!
review: My family and I used this hotel for a pre-cruise stay.  The room was clean and it seems that it had recently undergone an upgrade (fresh paint, new decor, etc.).  Our flight arrived several hours before check-in and we asked if by chance there was a room available. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  We were told that there were rooms being cleaned and one should be available in about an hour.  They offered to store our luggage in the back until the rooms were ready.  By the time that my brother arrived, the rooms were ready.  They also have a free shuttle that will take you anywhere in a 3 mile radius of the hotel.  This is good for dining and shopping options.  There is a restaurant on the hotel premises also.  I enjoyed the time that we were there and would book the…

title: Overview
review: Stayed a week. Felt like home. The staff was wonderful. The hotel was very clean. The halls were clean..hotel was quiet..My room was clean , roomy and comfortable.Had a great view from my room. Pool was great. Shuttle bus available anywhere you  may like to go within a 3 mile radius. There are plenty of stores and eateries nearby. There's 2 different malls nearby. Located close to the highway..perfect location.

title: Very good!
review: Dear BrightEyes828,  Thank you for choosing us for your long term stay!! We are delighted to read your 5 Star Review and are pleased you thoroughly enjoyed your time spent with us! Thank you!  We are looking forward to welcoming you back “home” soon!  Warmest regards,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Second Chance and still a waste of Money
review: I wanted to be fair to Marriott because I normally stay at Hilton or Hyatt so after my totally disappointing stay last year I wanted to try again. Worse this time then last time. I was supposed to get a quiet room this time but when I arrived they did not have any. My room has a stale moldy smell. The AC does not cool the room at all. Requested a fan and was told one was on the way but maid showed up no fan. And she put her hand in front of vent and said best it can do. Night stand had all kind of dirt or dust looked like termite dust. Will Never stay at a Marriott again!

title: Good Hotel for the Money
review: Dear bobscard,  Please allow me to sincerely apologize for not providing you with the flawless experience you deserve when staying at a Marriott. We seldom have the issues you experienced, and even though now corrected, we understand how frustrating it can be when all happens at once. Please accept our most sincere apologies. I truly thank you for sharing your thoughts as they allow us to constantly improve. Based on our direct contact offline, I am delighted to hear that you will give us another chance when visiting the area.  Looking forward to serving you again soon.  Sincerely,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: Purpose of visit was to check out graduate college schools plus vacation
review: My husband and I recently stayed at this hotel for eight nights. We booked a regular room on the top floor facing the back of the hotel.All the rooms have balconies ( with no furniture-how odd!) and these rooms over look a nice residential neighborhood The front of the hotel faces a main hywy,( US1)  and is noisy, so if you are looking for quite, choose to stay in a room in back.  The room was small but nice The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was nice too. The only problem was that the air conditioner was not working properly. It would not cool the room lower that 72 degrees. We complained to management and were offered another room-this time a suite-for our troubles. ( from what we read and hear from other guests, this hotel often has problems with their rooms not…

title: Overnight Stay Prior to Cruise
review: Room was clean and orderly. Nice outdoor swimming pool. Improvements needed: (1) Free continental breakfast (2) Hotel card swipe mechanisms didn't work sometimes (3) Need microwaves in rooms (4) Larger refrigerators with freezer section

title: Nicely Renovated Rooms
review: My wife and I stayed at this hotel prior to a cruise from Port Everglades.  This hotel is about 10 miles North of Port Everglades but the cost to stay here is much less than a similar hotel close to the port.  The savings in the room cost was offset by the cost of a rental car but that was not a problem for us because we wanted the freedom to choose an evening restaurant away from the hotel and to do some shopping before boarding our ship.  We found the hotel to be comfortable, clean and quiet.  The room was large and well appointed.  The parking was easy and since the hotel is located on North Federal Highway, it was a an easy drive the next morning to Port Everglades where we dropped off the rental car.  We will follow this plan and stay at this hotel for our future cruises.

title: Excellent
review: Front desk staff were excellent!! The beds very, very comfortable. Extremely clean rooms. Value was outstanding! We all enjoyed the pool and hot tub. Right by a busy road however; it was still very relaxing to be in the pool in the evening. The breakfast was not included in the room price which was a surprise. But, really enjoyed our stay and WILL be back!!

title: Nice room
review: Dear Patty M,  Thank you staying with us and for your lovely review! We are pleased to hear you were able to relax by the pool and whirlpool. It certainly is a attractively landscaped tropical area! You can choose to include breakfast in the rate at the time of reservation for a small additional fee, so next time please make sure to ask about that option if it is not presented to you. Please do not hesitate to contact me directly if there is anything I can assist with.   We are looking forward to welcoming you again soon!   Kindest regards,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: We really liked this Marriott.
review: Good hotel located in a central location.  The room looked like it was recently renovated.  Was very clean and the lobby was a great gathering place.  All of the staff I dealt with were very nice and helpful.  The pool area was very nice in the afternoon and was well kept.

title: Great Place!
review: The room was clean and comfortable, more than adequate, from nice linens to pleasing decorations.  The available little restaurant was well managed and made every effort to please.  The desk staff were friendly and accommodating.  Also the location was very convenient for our needs.  The available transportation van was a real plus since it saved us from having to drive around to our appointments.  We will return there.  Let me add, it had a nice pool area, and is couples-friendly, young-people friendly, and older-people-friendly.

title: Customer Service I would expect at The Ritz
review: My husband and I have stayed here in the past and loved it then and love it now too.  Flew in for a long weekend on Friday and came home today.  Renovations have been completed and the hotel is beautiful - with one exception - NO CHAIRS for the balconies!  Check in was quick and efficient and the two women at the front desk on Friday afternoon couldn't be nicer.  I had asked about the possibility of getting a couple of chairs before we went out and was told they would try.  When we got back that evening, I called and spoke with a young man asking if there was any luck in getting the chairs.  I will say that he was rude in his answers stating that there wouldn't be any so I didn't bother asking about them again - NOT someone of the usual Marriott character.    I can say that we…

title: Renovations finally complete!
review: I have stayed here in the past and it was a mess, renovations throughout the entire hotel.  So glad to see they are all done, and hotel has been modernized and up to new Courtyard standards.   Love the location, about a mile to the beach at all the activities at Lauderdale by the Sea.    Went down Sunday morning, and even scored a parking place at the beach and got a 3 mile run in.   Beds are comfy and rooms are clean.  CONS:   Balconies on all the rooms, and none of them have any chairs to enjoy weather except the 6 rooms by the pool.   (Rooms updates at this hotel were done over a year ago, so no excuses)

title: Happily Suprized!
review: Dear orreo5859 Thank you so much for your trust and loyalty over the years. Renovations are truly not much fun until they are complete! We are excited to hear you love the NEW Courtyard Fort Lauderdale East! Thank you for giving us another chance and giving us a Five Star review! It means the world to us. Please be assured that your comments regarding the balcony chairs are being taken very much into consideration. Thank you!   Looking forward to serving you again soon!   Best regards,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: We are super satisfied....
review: Very clean, exceptionally nice staff! FREE shuttle to the beach! And, I know it was less than 2 miles away, but so much more convenient to catch a ride, instead of looking for a parking place. Driver Leroy was AWESOME! Very friendly, helpful, and went out of the way to accommodate us!  The room smelt a little musty, but it's south Florida, with humidity of 100%, that can't be helped. The bed was so comfy, I didn't want to get out of it. Most hotels have the noisey air conditioning units, this one was so quiet, it actually hummed me to sleep. Thanks! We really enjoyed our stay!

title: Great location and not too far from the Beach
review: Dear penny s, Oh, we are so glad you enjoyed the hotel! We do have Ritz Carlton style mattresses, so we don’t blame you for not wanting to get out of bed. Thank you for your wonderful Five Star Review! We’ve shared it with our team, and please know you made Leroy’s day! Thank you! We hope to have the pleasure of having you stay with us again soon!   Warmest wishes,  Mary Apple, General Manager

title: "Nice Stop"
review: We have stayed for 2 nights in this hotel.  First, we were not sure about this hotel, since it's far away from the beach. But, about beach later. Anyway, we decided to live in this hotel. First, super duper friendy staff. Very personal consideration at check-in, showing interest in our stay, and were always showing care whenever we asked about something. They even let us check out one hour later without any problem. This varies of course with availability. Wi-Fi is free, works very good, fast and stable. We got the room on 4-th floor, swimming pool view. The hotel is very quiet. Same with room, but some noise from the road and roof fans on the balcony. With doors closed, it is very quiet. After many different hotels in Florida, we got tired of noisy airconditions. This one works…

title: Pending review... Good Hotel
review: I stayed for a few nights at this hotel, the rooms are comfortable and clean, the staff is attentive. One of the best things to my criteria of this hotel are the breakfasts, really good breakfasts.  It is close to a little mall where you can find options to eat.   I'll be back a this hotel for sure, Marriot hotels are always great.

title: Great Value Great Staff
review: Stayed here one night when our flight to DC was cancelled on March 4th due to bad weather.  It was on my company's preferred list and was a great value.  Arrived too early to check in so left our bags and took a taxi to the Galleria to get lunch and do some shopping. Returned and checked in with no problems.  Room with small balcony overlooked the main highway but it was nice and quiet.  Enjoyed a little pool time.  There were plenty of lounge chairs and it was peaceful.    Traffic is awful at rush hour so we abandoned plans to head towards the beach for dinner. One of the hotel staff recommended Tee Jay Thai Sushi for sushi and the shuttle got us there in no time and picked us up afterwards.  The free shuttle was convenient and Leroy was really nice.  The hotel comped my…

title: I'd give it a B overall
review: The Courtyard by Marriott referred me to a car service called TJ's. Called them to preschedule my shuttle and had it all squared away. They asked me my flight # and said they'd follow it in case it was late. We had a much longer layover than anticipated, so I arrived late into town. When I arrive at 10:05, I call TJ's as requested to come pick me up and they said they close at 10. All the drivers had gone home and there was nothing they could do. Harumph. I go ask airport security what my options are and they mention Go Shuttle. Wait for my bags for 30 minutes, then go out to get the Go Shuttle (around $18 per person to take you to hotel area). Once I get to the Go Shuttle guy who wasn't too friendly, he said it'd be at least another 1/2 hour wait before they came to pick me up.…

title: Great week in the sun
review: Dear H2sMom,   Thank you for your review. I am sorry to hear your trip was not as smooth as it should have been. We are glad you enjoyed the staff as well as the hotel’s amenities and the grounds. I am disappointed to read we didn’t earn an A+ on your mind, however understand that in some trips things just don’t go exactly as we planned. I still wish we would have completely “wowed” you with our service, to make up for those things that were out of our control.  We hope you still think of us during your next visit to Fort Lauderdale. I invite you to reach out to me directly with your itinerary, so that I can help in any way possible. Thank you again for sharing your thoughts, as it only help us improve.   Warmest regards,  Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Decent Courtyard close to Pier
review: Just returned from a one week stay. It was a great experience the hotel we had booked didn't have the room we booked so this was a last minute booking on spring break and we were really glad to get such a wonderful place. The staff are excellent and very friendly, the shuttle was great and we used it every day the drivers Leroy and Nixon were great. The rooms were spacious and clean patio furniture would be helpful.  It can be noisy with the fire station and hospital close by especially at the pool area. The food at the bisrtro is good we had breakfast there a few times and snacks. Parking is free. Overall it was a lovely sunny warm week and we would stay again and recommend it to otheres.

title: Very Good Hotel Courtyard by Marriott Fort Lauderdale
review: I love the hotel, it was very confortable and nice for the price we paid, the pool wasnt too big but we enjoyed it, we definitely want to come back. The service was good and the location is good. we enjoyed the journey  to the hotel.

title: Pleasant short stay
review: This hotel was clean, newly renovated and convenient to restaurants.  They provided a complimentary shuttle service to the beach, restaurants, and other near by businesses such as pharmacies.  The front desk staff is extremely friendly and helpful. One employee in particular, Elaine Falott, on the front desk gave us service over and above any expectations that I had. Despite the fact that this hotel was located on a busy intersection, the hotel room and pool were very quiet.  I do hope that they provide some type of outdoor furniture so that the balcony can be used.  Another nice feature is that the Fort Lauderale airport is a quick drive from the hotel.

title: Happy Stay
review: Dear Diane R,  Thank you for a wonderful review! We are honored to have had the opportunity to provide you with a delightful experience! Elaine has been part of our team for a very long time and is much cherished. Thank you for mentioning her by name, as this makes anyone’s day that much more joyous!  We are looking forward to having you stay with us again soon, when we will hopefully have lovely balcony furniture!  Best wishes,  Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Nice hotel but not for the money
review: For the most part we really liked staying at this hotel. Most of my main needs were met. Keep in mind that it is not a fancy Marriott, more like a 3 star hotel. Most Courtyards I have stayed in have been larger, more modern and had more amenities. If I chose a hotel on the beach, with an upscale restaurant and was more like a 5 star hotel, I would have been paying a lot more for the stay than I did. I think it is a good choice of hotel if you not seeking luxury accommodations, but you want a safe, clean and comfortable place to stay in. It is a little further inland, close to the inter coastal and very accessible for driving...right at the corner the US 1 and Commercial and near the 95.  The features of the hotel that I really liked were the rooms, which were very clean and…

title: I would Avoid this hotel
review: All my reviews are price adjusted.  This property charges near $300/night for a typical Courtyard but one with no continental breakfast, no in-room coffee or microwave, and a poor location.  Sits on Hwy 1 at a busy intersection.  Pool is nice but constant road noise as you could through a straw from the pool deck to the road.  Can not see the ocean.  The property from my standpoint is worth about $140/night  They provide no "included" coffee or breakfast because the contract with a small "Bistro" restaurant in the lobby.  The Courtyard at the FLL airport does the same thing.  On the upside the staff is good, the rooms and property are clean and comfortable and up to Marriott standards

title: One of the best Courtyards we've stayed in.
review: This is one of the best Courtyards we've stayed in: the rooms are spacious with comfy beds, the bathrooms large (lots of counter space) with lovely showers. The overall appearance of the lobby is pleasing with small areas for conversation, small tv screens, computers, USB plugs, and a small restaurant open for breakfast and dinner which was more than adequate for our needs. I used the laundry which was clean and bright ($2 wash, $2 dry, detergent free.) Wifi was free and fast, TV screens were nice, coffee machines in room. The pool looked nice, but it was cold while we were there, so did not use it. The location is easy (right on Route 1 about 30 min. from the port area which was one reason we chose it.) We'll visit again (we have friends in the area.)

title: perfect start
review: Dear janrm, Thank you for the Grand review! There is quite an amount of thought and work that goes into renovating a hotel so we are thrilled you appreciated the amenities so much! Indeed, our great location with easy in and out access is one of the main reasons why our customers select our hotel. Thank you for staying with us and sharing your thoughts! Hope your cruise was lovely!  Looking forward to having the pleasure of seeing you again soon! We have a reputation to live up to!  Sincerely, Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Great and comfort!!
review: no complaints, nice rooms, large beds, clean and new bathroom, good and tasty breakfast, friendly stuff, clean pool, free and quick wifi, quiet, perfect start for our Florida rv trip, our favorite for the next trip. we can recommend it

title: Non-smoking hotel..guests smoking all around pool
review: Dear Andreas P, There is nothing like starting off on the right track! We are delighted to have offered you such experience. Thank you so much for the 5 Star review! We hope the rest of your travels in Florida are as great!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Kindest regards, Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Great place to relax
review: I really enjoyed staying this hotel with my mom back in the fall. First when we walked we noticed how big the lobby was. The guy was nice during check in. He asked about the type of room we had which was on the third floor facing the parking lot. Which was better to me than the pool. Check out was easy. Our room was clean from the bedroom to the bathroom. The beds were comfy. They give you extra blankets if you need them they keep in the closet. The shower is huge. The balcony was nice to look out of. You also get a TV with good channels, I had my laptop so tv wasn't important. They have free wifi. It really was a great experience for me and my mom. There are local stores around in the area like a few resturants across the street like Denny's and an Olive Garden. They have…

title: Hidden Gem
review: Evangeline at the Courtyard Fort Lauderdale East is the definition of customer service as it should be. She is truly meant for her role. She was the most professional, friendly and kind hospitality professional that my husband and I have ever encountered, despite having stayed at Ritz Carltons & Four Seasons. Evangeline made us feel like we were at a 5 star hotel.  My father was having heart surgery at the nearby hospital, and Evangeline went above and beyond to do everything she could to make that very scary experience as easy as possible for us. My Dad's surgery was scheduled around Christmas, and she showed absolutely no regret for having to be at work during the holiday. She embodied the spirit of the holiday and of "immaculate" hospitality!  Not only did she consistently go…

title: Can't wait to return
review: Dear for-the-journey, Thank you for your thoughtful compliments; they are deeply cherished.  I wish you could have seen the glow on her face when she read your review.  We are indeed privileged to have Evangeline in our team! We hope your father is quickly recovering and wish you and your family vibrant health!  We look forward to seeing you again soon, even though we trust your journey to Fort Lauderdale will be of a different nature.  Gratefully yours,  Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Great Hotel...But Had a Bug Issue
review: We came and stayed for a week after Christmas and had a wonderful experience.  Our room was clean and comfy.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  Three out of the five mornings we were there the breakfast staff prepared special fruit cups for my 6 year old with life threatening food allergies.  On our final 2 days a different employee informed me that she was too busy to give him a cup of pre-sliced fruit without melon because she was too busy.  She said he could have an orange instead.  This interaction is why I can't give this little gem a 5.  Other than her everyone was very kind and welcoming to our family.  The shuttle was so easy and the beach is just a short drive away.  We will be back but next time I will make it a point to inform the manager upon check-in of my sons…

title: Clean, friendly service. Inexpensive
review: I stayed here from 12/22/14-12/24/14 and overall I found it to be a very nice hotel but I only spent about 15 minutes in my first room before I found a major bug problem.  I was sitting in bed watching TV and as soon as I shut the light off next to the bed I noticed a bug crawl out from under the Bose Wave radio on the table next to me.  I turned the light back on and it scurried away.  I reluctantly lifted up the Bose radio and found about 4 roaches under it...looked like mom and a few babies.  I freaked, gathered my stuff, and went to the front desk.  They gave me a new room immediately...I just hope they actually had someone fumigate the room before they gave it to someone else.  Now on to the rest of the review.  The rooms looked brand new and were very clean and modern with…

title: Good Choice
review: Dear Robc311, Thank you for giving us the opportunity to accommodate you during this visit to Fort Lauderdale. I am glad you thoroughly enjoyed our new rooms, lobby and great staff. I am terribly sorry about the bug incident. A professional pest control company performs periodic preventive service to avoid such unacceptable issues. I have already discussed this with them and extra attention has been and will be devoted to our property. . Often our guests leave their balcony doors open to enjoy the lovely Florida Winter weather! We are lucky to have a great housekeeping team  Thank you for staying and giving us another chance. We are looking forward to providing you with a totally wonderful experience soon!   Warmest regards,  Rob  Lewis, General Manager

title: nice stay
review: Stayed 2 nights.  Nicely decorated, clean, comfortable, and quiet room facing rear parking lot.  Nice sized bathroom with great shower.  Staff was very friendly and helpful, with printed information on nearby restaurants.  Short drive to restaurants, shopping, and beach; short drive west to I-95.   Pool and deck were a pleasure; whirlpool spa could have been a few degrees warmer.  Bistro had nice selection for breakfast and small supper.

title: Clean rooms, great staff
review: Stayed 2 nights, entire hotel has been refurbished.  Nicely decorated room. Bathroom was super nice too.  Room was super clean. Very friendly and helpful staff. Hotel is only a mile from the beach and they also offer a free shuttle to anywhere within a 3 mile radius of the hotel.  The area where it's located is convenient to almost anything and anywhere.   Elevator is in the process of being replaced so, only 1 is working and is super slow... if patience is not one of your virtues, you may want to stay on the first or second floor. Other than that minor inconvenience, we had a very pleasant stay.

title: Underwhelming....
review: Dear ECS9999 Thank you very much for the wonderful review! Knowing when our guests feel we deserve 5 stars fuels our days! We share any feedback with our staff, and everyone gets very excited every time we get such a great rating. Thank you also for your patience while we enhanced our elevators. I couldn’t help but notice the spectacular dog on your profile picture. Wow! What a beautiful animal!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We truly hope to have the pleasure of serving you again soon! Best wishes for the New Year!  Kindest regards,  Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Great Stay
review: I recently stayed here for three nights and generally underwhelmed.    Checkin was easy, ,and there is a large, free parking lot on the property.  The location is a bit of a wasteland, with non of Fort Lauderdale's attractions nearby.  Everything of interest is a drive from here.  The rooms were nicely sized, with a large work desk in the room, and a TV that's viewable from the bed, chair, and desk.  Internet worked well, and was free for guests.  No robes were provided, and there wasn't an inroom safe for valuables.  THe bathroom was large, with plenty of space for toiletries, and a wonderful stylish shower enclosure with curved glass doors.  THere is a nice spacious lobby with plenty of space to work, enjoy breakfast, or read the paper.  However, once breakfast is done the…

title: Terrific Staff!
review: Dear EricNilson, Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you and for sharing your thoughts. We are glad you enjoyed your room and the lobby area and were pleased with our staff. We do apologize for the elevator situation, as maintenance work was being completed during your stay. We are also very sorry about the ice machines, and understand how frustrating it can be when amenities don’t function properly. Unfortunately it was one of those situations where the smallest issue, in order to solve it right, led to a very complicated ordeal that required tearing into ceilings, enlisting a professional plumber, waiting for parts, etc. We are, however, pleased to share that the saga of the ice machines is now over as they are functioning perfectly and our ceiling looks like nothing happened!  We thank you again for choosing the Courtyard Fort Lauderdale East and hope to be of service in the future.  Warmest regards,  Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Perfect stay
review: Stayed in this hotell for a week in september.  Clean nice hotel .  Friendly and helpfull staff. The pool was clean and nice Werent to impressed by the bisto on site. We used Dennys across the road .  All in all a good stay :)  Recommended

title: Very clean!
review: Utilized some of my reward points for one night due to an event I was attending in the area.  Staff at desk very friendly, good parking, nice sized room.  No problems whatsoever.  I would suggest getting a room in the back of the hotel though since we overlooked the pool which in turn overlooked Federal Highway, which was very noisy.

title: Good Value in Fort Lauderdale
review: Spent a night at this Courtyard. It was surprisingly comfortable for the type of property. The room was immaculate and despite being located on a busy road the room was quiet. While it was Sunday when we were there, I found it convenient to the airport. The staff were all very nice and helpful. I would stay there again.

title: Very Accommodating
review: Excellent customer service at front desk and restaurant. Everyone went out of their way to be helpful. Gave great local reccomendations for dining and tourists. Great free shuttle to local spots Large clean room…nice pool. Great location to beach and Holy Cross hospital

title: A Well-Kept Secret
review: Having recently relocated after living in the area for years, I return often on business.  I am not sure why I never noticed this hotel before but, when booking rooms for my return trips, I sure never gave this place a thought.  When prices started to rise for the season, I looked for a more economical option in the North Ft. Lauderdale area and found this.  I was sort of dreading having to "step down" to this property after the very nice resorts I was using during the off-peak summer stays but, wow, was I pleasantly surprised.  The lobby has been well-described in many prior reviews ... I would add that, though the presence of a restaurant on-site is a nice bonus, I did think it was a tad overpriced (eg. small glass of house-type wine for $10).  That's not a big deal though as…

title: Felt Like a Motor Lodge
review: I was surprised that a hotel associated with the Marriott Label would be in such poor condition. I had requested a quiet room but the first room, I was placed in was on the first floor facing the parking lot RM 115. The room had a terrible smell of must and mold.  I asked the front desk to move me into a different room.  Of course still wanting a quiet room, I was placed on the 5th floor now facing a 6 lane Highway and on the corner of Commercial Ave.  Needless to say, I did not get much sleep.  Over all the rooms were clean and nice.. but gave me the feeling I was staying in a Motor lodge rather than a Category 4 hotel.  This could be a great hotel but they are going to have to seal their windows and doors to avoid the outside road noise.  Not a happy camper about this one.…

title: Exceeded expectations
review: Dear bobsacard,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. I am truly disappointed to hear we failed to provide you with the flawless experience one expected from a Marriott.  Please accept our most sincere apologies. I have addressed the room concerns with our engineering department in order to ensure our rooms are in the perfect condition our guests deserve.  I sincerely hope you give us another chance to serve you and your family while visiting Fort Lauderdale.  Warmest regards,  Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Pleasantly Surprised
review: I should start by saying that I lived in Ft. Lauderdale for 10 years and just a few months ago relocated.  I was back in town for a special event and needed a place to stay.  So while I know the area very well, I had no idea where to stay in a hotel.  I chose this hotel because it was closer to where I would be spending most of my weekend (Pompano) and had the amenities our group needed (a king bed with pull out sofa).    I have to say that this hotel exceeded my expectations.  The lobby was modern, updated, and had a variety of perks like two Mac desktops with free black and white printing.  There was a Starbucks cafe, bar and breakfast/snack kitchen, as well as a grab-and-go area for drinks and snacks.  There were plenty of comfortable seating arrangements for eating,…

title: Mixed feelings
review: Dear fullah, WOW! Thank you very much for such a detailed and fantastic review! We simply could not be happier, as exceeding our guest expectations is exactly what strive for. You just made our day!  Thank you again!  Kindest regards,  Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Nice Hotel
review: Ended up staying here unexpectedly and getting their very last room. The bed was extremely comfortable, and the room itself was very nice. Bathroom was a bit drab, but I enjoyed the Paul Mitchell shower products. Pool area seemed nice and clean. I would stay here again.

title: Better with breakfast
review: I think this hotel has a lot to offer for the combination of price and location.  I paid 99 dollars per night for a king sized bed, nice room and wifi and breakfast included. Pool clean and inviting.  Staff especially in the restaurant were very friendly.  I've stayed here before and I'll seek out this location on my next trip to S. Florida.

title: Very comfortable stay!
review: Stayed at this property for 6 nights with my family and had a blast. Room is spacious, with a balcony, very clean and with comfortable beds. Kids had a lot of fun in the pool which was maintained by personnel almost on a daily basis. Plenty of free parking space. Hotel provides a shuttle anywhere within 3 miles range of the property. We used it to go to the nearby Lauderdale By The Sea beach and back. Although at times there is a long wait, especially when the weather turns for the worst. The lobby and lounge area is extremely inviting, very modern looking. They have a bistro on property, but we never ate there as there are plenty of dining options in the area. There are 2 computers with printers available for internet browsing free of charge.  Great Hotel, I  Highly recommend…

title: Great location
review: Dear GoYankees28 Thank you for your wonderful review! We are delighted that you and your family had the chance to enjoy the hotel’s amenities, many delicious restaurants and fun activities offered in the area. We love it when our guests have a great time!  Hope to see you and the kids again soon. Perhaps you will have a chance to try our great offerings at The Bistro next time!  Warmest regards,  Rob Lewis

title: Very clean & comfortable room.
review: Rooms were very clean, bathroom was updated, pool was large and well maintained.  Free wi-fi, and PC and printers available  for free in the lobby.  On site restaurant.  Accommodating staff. Large towels provided at the pool.

title: Much improved hotel; good location
review: Dear Meadow61, Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the fantastic review. We love to hear when our guests relish our hotel amenities and location. Thank you for sharing! We shall look forward to your return! Yours truly,  Rob Lewis

title: Nice Clean Hotel!
review: We only stayed for a night with the family. When stay at a hotel, cleanliness and upkeep are important as is customer service. The place was very clean and well kept. The kids loved the big pool and didn't want to get out:). The desk clerk on duty at check in was very pleasant and chatty. She seemed to like what she does.   The room was a typical Courtyard room and very clean. We like this style of Courtyard with an actual courtyard rather than the newer high rise style hotel. That is what we find appealing with segment of Marriott. We would stay here again.

title: Very Good for Business or Pleasure
review: This property seems to have undergone a recent update and there were still signs of work in the parking lot. The lobby area looked fairly new and my check in went quickly and efficiently. There is a effort to call you by name which I appreciate. The set up is different in that the reception is in one building and you must go outside to the building with the sleeping rooms. Not a big deal since it was covered. But, when I went to my room the clouds opened up and the wind blew some spray as I walked under the overhang.  My room was clean and looked well maintained. My bed was OK for me but I have found that unless your bed sags or is lumpy, it is a personal preference. Mine did neither and was OK . The Bathroom was clean with no observable mold or mildew which can be a problem in…

title: Good location, clean rooms, nice amenities
review: when I booked this hotel for our last vacation, I wasn't expecting much as it was a bit farther from my desired location. But I was pleasantly surprised to find it situated at an ideal location. Its only a mile away from Lauderdale-by-the-Beach beach. There are many restaurants near by. Its also only 2 miles away from I-95S which makes travelling very easy. Hotel provides a complimentary shuttle for anywhere within 3 miles. Rooms are clean and spacious. Hotel lobby has few food options for convenience. I think its one of the places I will certainly recommend to friends and will like to stay here again.

title: Perfect for a Mai Kai visit
review: We stayed here for one night last week during our pilgrimage to Mai Kai and were very pleased.  Our newly renovated room was good sized, very clean, and comfortable. Our room was on the back side of the hotel and we didn't have any issues with road noise at all. The bathroom was larger than many hotels offer with lots of counter space and a nice large shower. The entire property looked fresh and newly updated.   The staff at the front desk were very friendly and helpful, especially at check-in.   Since our stay was so brief, we didn't take advantage of any of the hotel amenities but the pool area looked nice enough and the breakfast/restaurant area in the lobby would also be convenient if you needed it. They also have a small area with snacks and beverages for sale, which is…

title: Oasis with Convenient Cocktail Lounge
review: The renovation is complete. It's clean, has friendly staff and a grill that saves you time and effort for either a treat or a healthy option of meals and snacks.....I'm planning my next visit so I can get back to civilization and bright lights big city....

title: Super Fun Night
review: Spent a night here with wife an had one of the best stay I've had at a hotel in years.  Super clean, spacious room and good location for getting away from hustle and bustle of life.  Located near restaurants and nightlife which are great for a couple looking to enjoy time together.

title: Nice Surpise!
review: Had to visit a friend in the Holy Cross Hospital and was looking somewhere close, safe, clean and good service.  The Courtyard Marriott Ft Lauderdale is 2 minutes away from the hospital.  Service was excellent, extremely friendly and helpful staff, excellent Bistro with daily happy hour as well as a little convenience area.   Rooms were nice size, very clean and modern.  There is a pool and a gym and its only 10 minutes away from the Beach with many nice restaurants.  Front Desk clerk was super helpful in directed us to good, reasonable restuarants nearby. Overall a pleasantly good surprise for a last minute trip.

title: Great Experience
review: My family came in to visit me in town and I needed an nice place for them to stay.  This hotel has been remodeled and the rooms were great!  My younger niece and nephew loved the pool and my older family loved the atmosphere and breakfast at the hotel.  The landscaping is very nice and the pool is great for kids and adults.  The staff were very attentive.  They were even recovering the parking lot while we stayed and they were very courteous about helping us park and making sure all our needs were exceeded.  The room service ladies were wonderful, and considering we had to toddlers with us they did an excellent job.  The hotel staff always smiled and waved at the kids and made them feel special.  The hotel is also very conveniently located to restaurants, shops, and just a very…

title: Clean, modern, recently renovated. Got what I expected for a Courtyard.
review: Stayed here on the first two nights of a two week vacation with my girlfriend.  We snagged this room using Hotwire's "secret deal" function for only $45per night.   While the hotel isn't anything fancy, It's not too shabby either. It's your basic 3-Star hotel aimed at business travelers.  The location is mostly in a commercial area of Ft. Lauderdale. Not really very scenic, but also not that far from the beach and the touristy areas, assuming you have a car?  I will also say the property is very clean and modern contemporary.  A complete renovation has recently been completed and everything was like new.  From Check-in to room.  No complaints.  Basic, but clean, modern, comfortable.

title: Fantastic!
review: Stayed here for a quick overnight and thought it was great!  Lobby has been completely redone and so have the rooms and you can clearly tell they put a lot of effort into the renovation because the rooms were almost NEW.  Bathroom area was awesome! Beds were amazing and everything was great. Sharon at the desk was Fantastic and gave great customer service. Pool and hot tub were also great! The exterior of the hotel could use some work but all in all everything was absolutely fantastic and I would gladly stay again!

title: Great rooms!
review: The hotel is a little older, however the rooms are in exceptional condition. It is obvious that here's been a remodel in the recent past.  The check in as with most Marriott properties was good and the staff courteous! The rooms are in a separate building connected with a covered walk way.  I requested  a room away from the elevator and found it to be very quiet and I slept well.  The only knock would be that the coffee maker and ice bucket were shelved in the closet, not a big deal, just a little puzzling.   Great stay!!

title: Clean and convenient
review: Stayed here 5 days in March 2014 using Marriott Points.  Very convenient location, less than 10 minutes to the beach.  The restaurant selection on Rt 1 and at the beach end of Commercial Ave and access to other areas made this a great choice.  Parking at end of Commercial can be tight, make sure you take a roll of quarters!  Recent remodel is complete and the place is beautiful in the new Courtyard format.  Area neighborhood looks a little rough but has improved greatly over the years.  Parking lot access is a little tricky if you leave/arrive at rush hour.  Staff is accomodating and we had a problem that was promptly corrected by management.  We used the laundry and found it clean and convenient, soap provided by hotel.  Pool area was nice.  Limited on premises restaurant but…

title: Economical, clean, good location
review: Not on the beach but 15 min drive, central and close to all major roads. Impressive friendly staff, great Starbucks coffee in bistro.  Adequate parking, clean rooms, quiet rooms and nice jacuzzi pool area.

title: Good Hotel
review: We stayed here for 1 night before a cruise. The outside of the place is a little shady looking (especially when you arrive at midnight) but the rooms and service were very good. The gym did not have air conditioning when I went and it was sweltering in there, but other than that I experienced only good things. I would stay here if in town again.

title: Restful and convenient
review: Stayed for a one week vacation with family. Highly recommended for its up to date, clean, and restful qualities, including sitting by the outdoor pool.The rooms and baths were recently modernized. Two Apple computers (HP version available) and printer are in the lobby for use by guests. The location serves as an excellent base to visit the area beaches and for traveling from Palm Beach to Miami.  The manager and staff are friendly, courteous, and always offer their assistance. On this trip, we made an excellent choice.

title: An emerging business hotel
review: More than a courtyard, the renovations are making each room and stay luxurious without the outlandish pricing. Internet access has been significantly upgraded--- and FAST. Can't wait to see the new breakfast area next month.

title: Great Beds
review: Dear Jerrysellsre, We are glad you enjoyed our hotel and service! Thank you for your great review! Our renovations are now complete so you will be able to enjoy a delicious breakfast with Starbucks coffee or perhaps dinner and cocktails during your next stay. Would love to hear your thoughts on the new lobby and Bistro!  Thank you for choosing our Courtyard Fort Lauderdale East! We hope to have the pleasure of accommodating you again soon!  Sincerely,  Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Mixed Review..Would Still Recommend Though
review: After staying at another chain the previous few nights, we could really appreciate the quality of the beds here. Very comfortable. Though on a loud and busy road, the soundproofing was excellent which also made for good sleeping. The room and facilities were clean.  The bathroom was a nice size but it was odd that it did not have a fan. It took a very long time to get hot water. Also, the wonderfully roomy shower did not allow for an easy reach to the towel bar since the door to it opened at the opposite end. The room could have used another mirror and a bit more lighting. But I give it a high rating because it was great for the most important function - sleep!

title: Thought we'd arrived in heaven!
review: They were in the process of being remodeled and did tell us that.  Still, early in the morning there was banging which we could hear, which woke us up.  Also, I don't know how many fires there are in the neighborhood but sirens kept us awake all night. Why would I recommend it, they DID tell us about the construction.  The pool was VERY NICE and they did supply towels.  The room was clean and it had comfortable beds and it is a good location. I am sure there are some rooms, when it is completely renovated, will be on a quiet side. They did have free computer service, WI FI and I thought the breakfast was OK. Walking to a car was a bit of a hike from the temporary exit.

title: Expensive stay for a mediocre hotel
review: After arriving in Fort Lauderdale for my father-in-law's funeral after midnight (due to flight delays), and staying in a much shabbier motel down the street our first night (which was terrible from the get-go), we had the luck to call this Marriott Courtyard early the next morning and book nights for the remainder of our stay.  As the review title says, we thought we'd arrived in heaven when we moved to this hotel.  Although the hotel is being renovated, we got top-notch professional service in the lobby and were allowed to check in two hours early.  Our room was newly renovated, beautiful, clean and spacious, and looked out over the pool from our 5th floor balcony.  After our experience in the shabbier motel, everything about our room and the hotel itself were several levels up…

title: Nice location, good quality room at affordable price
review: Enjoyed the stay despite the construction going on.  Nice room with nice amenities.  One room, not two with any separate sitting area, and doesn't have a couch or sitting chair, which is needed but not enough room for it.  Closet had hair dryer, coffee maker.  Shower was walk in with sliding glass door all the way to the floor - nice.  Carpeting in elevator and hallways could use updating despite the fact they said the fifth floor was just renovated.  If you like Marriott luxury but want to save a little money, this is a good middle ground hotel for you.  I would stay here again.  They are doing a bistro under construction should be nice when done.  Plenty of parking in their own lot.    To the management, add an explanatory placard on the wall next to the heating and air…

title: Very nice property, not the best location
review: The staff and property were above par.  The only bad thing I can say, which I understand, is the hotel van had a radius of 3 miles.  Cabs are extremely expensive in Florida and if you're planning on going to the beach make sure you book close to the beach.  This is a nice Marriott and the staff were extremely helpful.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear InHotTheBizz, Thank you for your comments on our wonderful staff and property!  I apologize if there was a misunderstanding during your stay regarding our complimentary van service.  Indeed it operates within a 3 mile radius of the hotel and this includes the beach, which is only 1 mile away. The charming seaside village and fishing pier of Lauderdale-by-the-Sea is certainly one of our van’s most frequented destinations!  We are looking forward to showing you the sights near our hotel during your next stay in Fort Lauderdale!  Kindest regards,  Rob Lewis General Manager

title: Will be fine once renovated - but not great.
review: Hotel is being renewed. We had a brand new and modern room. Bed was very comfortable. Nice, modern bathroom with big shower. Hotel was very clean. Free wifi. Nice pool area. Staff very friendly and helpful. Free shuttle service within 3 mile area. 5 minutes ride to the beach. Good complimentary breakfast during renovation of the hotel. Free parking.

title: Rooms clean, service lacking
review: Dear Isa-2316, Thank you very much for the wonderful feedback! We are simply delighted and looking forward to accommodating you in the future!  Best wishes for the New Year!  Sincerely, Rob Lewis General Manager

title: Reasonable stay
review: When in Fort Lauderdale, I usually stay closer to the airport but received a great rate during the Columbus Day weekend.  The hotel is being renovated which offered a few minor challenges.  Upon arrival, the staff was welcoming and check-in was quick and efficient.  Got a room on one of the renovated floors.  Corridor was bright and clean.  The king room offered reasonable space with a comfortable bed.  Closet is small is awkwardly designed though adequate for a two night stay.  Breakfast with the usual offerings was a plus as was the free Internet access. Good location on US 1.

title: ftlaudertrip
review: Hotel under construction. Not a big issue but may want to call ahead. Poor TV reception and remote! Maid service schedule was questionable. Good location but right next to a busy highway. Staff was pleasant and very helpful. Pool dirty (or at least it appeared that way). Needs to be renovated. Street bums panhandling at nearby intersection and then observed sleeping in grass beside hotel.

title: Worst hotel EVER
review: Dear natashcd, Thank you for sharing your experience during your stay with us. I am happy to hear you were pleased with our wonderful staff! We are delighted to share that, since your last stay, as part of our extensive renovation efforts, our pool has been completely re-finished displaying a brand new and inviting appearance! Our great location is based on our proximity to the beach and our convenient access to US1, where most restaurants and stores are located. We trust that our commercial strength glass balcony doors provided a quiet and restful atmosphere in your sleeping room. Many situations are out of our control, but we do take necessary measures to encourage undesirable individuals to move elsewhere in an effort to provide a better experience for our guests.   I am concerned with the observation regarding the TV reception and housekeeping schedule. We have just upgraded to High Definition signal to feed our HDTV Flat screen televisions in the rooms and have had a wonderful response from guests. I would appreciate if you contact me directly at 954-771-8100  to discuss these matters further.  We look forward to welcoming you to our totally renovated hotel in the near future!  Sincerely, Rob Lewis General Manager

title: Very welcoming and professional staff
review: Worst hotel I have ever stayed at! They oversold their rooms so they gave us a family of four a room that had a king bed and a couch. The room was old and smelled funny and the bathroom doesn't have a fan/vent. The front desk staff was atrocious and had the attitude that we were more than lucky to even have a room considering they were overbooked. I'm sorry but that's just not my problem. I paid for my room like everyone else. The hotel is under construction so you can forget about sleeping in any day they start promptly at eight am. They shut off the water almost daily and failed to give us a courtesy call or note to inform us of this. Imagine coming back from the beach or pool and hopping into the shower to find out the water has been turned off! And when you call front desk…

title: Staff treats you like you are at a 5-star hotel
review: Dear Van H, Please accept my most sincere apologies for your terrible experience at our hotel. I understand how frustrating it can be to not receive the room type you desired, experience water shutoffs when most needed, be inconvenienced by construction noise and, to top it off, not receive the warm and welcoming service you deserve.  I would certainly be upset too! Undergoing a renovation is probably one of the most challenging issues a hotel manager has to deal with, as we strive to offer guests a seamless experience while improving the hotel to better meet their needs. In an effort to do so, we constantly need to manage the unexpected, such as water shutoffs. When necessary, we work with the contractors to perform them when they will cause the least inconvenience and we try to inform our guests as soon as we are aware, but inevitably someone may be affected. I am truly sorry we were not able to offer you that seamless experience. I have re-iterated the start time of “no earlier than 9am” with the contractor and his team.  Equally, a renovation can be taxing on our team members, who otherwise would handle a situation properly and gracefully. However, there is no excuse for not making our guests feel valued and appreciated. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, as I will spend some extra training time with our team to ensure our guests receive the impeccable service that is expected from a Marriott Hotel.  I truly hope that, once we are completely renovated with the Courtyard Refreshing Business and totally re-designed rooms, you will consider giving us another chance to show you we can be one of the Marriott’s you love.  Warmest regards,  Rob Lewis General Manager

title: Best experience during Florida trip
review: Unfortunately I stayed only one night before my departure back to Europe, but after a week of traveling around Florida, this hotel was like oasis of comfort. I really enjoyed my stay as rooms are very nice and modern, bathroom is simply fabulous - amazing walk-in shower.  Ongoing constructions were not disturbing at all and there was no impact on me as a guest.  I would definitely return in case that will travel to this location again.

title: spectakular staff & modern room
review: stayed for a week may 30-jun 06. construction goin on - but it neva hampered or interfered with nything. Staff was magnificent esp.Manuell who was the best employee i eva encountered in all ma stay at 3 star hotel & above. He always wanted to help & always enquired about your stay. i stayed on 4th floor - Bathroon was brand new. Room was magnificent. Room attendants were friendly & left notes to keep u inform. Hotel placed alot of emphasis on customer satisfaction. Will definitely stay again & recommend to ma friends & family. With dedicated employees like Manuell around - y consider another hotel.

title: Good location for Hospital/Beach
review: Stayed here for 2 nights due to hospital visiting.  Location is right across the street.  Easy in and out and clean.  A few blocks to beach as well.  Hotel is under contruction but with the exception of the lobby it was not inconvenient.  Up to Courtyard standards, would return.

title: Most comfortable bed
review: We stayed in a renovated room & the bed was one of the most comfortable ones we've ever had! The bathroom was great as well with a fantastic walk-in shower & tremendous water pressure. We were very pleasantly surprized as we have stayed at other hotels in Fort Lauderdale for approximately the same rate which in no way compared to this hotel.  Unfortunately, we were only there for one night before leaving on our cruise but we shall certainly be returning next time we're in Fort Lauderdale.

title: Make sure you ask for a newly renovated room!!!
review: Very good service but it's an older courtyard and it has 2 floors only renovated so make sure you request one of them or else you will be stuck with a much older room!!! During my stay there they were having some renovation on the lobby area so they made up for that with a free continental breakfast for all the guests which was a nice touch.

title: Staff Service Stands Out
review: The hotel is in a practical location, being on the US-1 road at Lauderdale by the Sea, rather than coast facing or with great views. This is reflected in price. The area seemed fine to me and very safe to be in, though you need to really drive or taxi to restaurants on a night. Its a 20 minute drive ($25 taxi ride) to Fort Lauderdale Downtown, or 2 minutes to other restaurant options.  The hotel itself seemed slightly old, but was undergoing renovation when I was there to put in a new Starbucks Bistro. Consequently, breakfast for us was free, which was a great touch. Rooms had everything needed with again great & easy free wifi and full size TV.  The area closeby has lots to do with 20 mins drives to the coast or shopping, 30 mins to Everglades Holiday Park for airboat tours,…

title: nice surprise
review: Upon my arrival I thought I made a mistake. was not impressed with area, part residential, part commercial. But the employees made me feel very at ease. The lady who checked us in was unbelievably helpful and nice. She went above and beyond what most people do. Gave us a ground floor room, facing the pool. This was great, able to walk right out and jump in. Rooms were very spacious , with comfortable beds. My only recommondation would be having microwave in room. Water pressure in shower was fantastic. Have not found that, at hotels I have stayed. overall I think I made the right choice.

title: Convenient
review: The Courtyard by Marriott Fort Lauderdale East is perfect if you want easy access to Holy Cross Hospital or have business in the North Fort Lauderdale/Pompano Beach area. The reception area is being renovated - a fact that we were made aware of when we booked and a temporary reception area was set up in the breakfast room next to the pool. The rooms were large and clean, the beds comfortable, the WIFI connection excellent through ibahn, and the price was very reasonable when compared to other similar properties. The hotel runs a shuttle bus to Holy Cross.

title: Beware of booking through Expedia
review: I should have compared before I booked through Expedia. I know. Yet I have a difficult time not putting most of the blame on Expedia. How can they justify charging me more than $100 more for a three-night stay than if I had booked directly through the hotel. Plus, I failed to get any Marriott Reward points by booking with Expedia. My advice: Never use Expedia. It's a giant rip-off. Book directly through the hotel. They will always meet any advertised rate on Expedia. Now, as far as the hotel goes, it was under rennovation during our stay. The first night we had a room with a musty smell, old carpeting and a lot of noise in the hallway at 1 a.m. Next morning I complained and received a newly remodeled room on the fourth floor. Overall, it was very nice. However, none of the rooms…

title: Very disappointing
review: The restaurant of the hotel is under renovation which I was not made aware of prior to arriving.  So i had o drive off places just to get food.  The roads that are around the hotel are extremely busy.  You put your life into the hands of your higher power just driving out of the parking lot.  They did offer breakfast though in a little make shift dining hall but that was over priced.  They did keep the area clean  which is why they get two stars. There is no indoor pool and the one they have outside is really small.  Their exercise area is also really tiny.  I spent 3 nights and spent about 400 dollars there.  It would have been ok if they charged me $250 and offered free breakfast.   Their service was lacking too,.  No one offered to help take my bags to the room, although they…

title: Carpets need washing
review: I recently stayed here and although the lobby seemed clean and service was ok, the carpet in the room was extremely dirty. It was not worth the price I paid. I expected better as I've stayed at many Courtyard Marriotts in the past.

title: Pre-Cruise Hotel
review: Dear Samngie G,  Thank you for your feedback. I am truly sorry we failed you. We are currently under a complete renovation that will include not only a brand new lobby concept, but a total revamp of our room layout, custom finishes and luxurious bathrooms. We hope you find it in your heart to give us another chance during your next stay in Fort Lauderdale.   Warmest regards,  Rob Lewis, General Manager

title: Excellent Stay
review: It was our initial intention to find a hotel closer to the cruise port but opted on this hotel for 2 nights based on price; our options were limited given the fact that it was March break.  Because this place was further from the airport and downtown core, it did mean a higher cab fare getting here.  Nearby 'night life / entertainment' is also restricted...if you are hoping to walk to your destination.  Many reviews we read prepared us for a hotel that would be less than desirable; however we were pleasantly surprised.  Staff was very friendly, our room was very clean, and the facilities (pool, restaurant, front foyer / lounge area) were all great.  The buffet breakfast was good value.  The hotel did provide 'free' shuttle service to the beach located about one mile away,…

title: Decent.  Newly renovated. Not as close to beach as you might want.
review: We stayed on March 8th, a day before our cruise.  We stayed in the refinished building overlooking the pool.  What a nice view. The room was beautiful.  The staff even better.  The hotel had a shuttle that took us down to the beach and a restaurant called Aruba, which was right on the beach, that we really liked.  We gave them a call and they came promptly to pick us up.  Our driver was great and even stopped for us on the way back so we could purchase water and wine for our cruise.  He made the trip fun.  Kudos to the staff! They had fresh cookies in the evening and fresh coffee and green apples that were complimentary in the morning.  They did have a breakfast buffet for purchase for $10.  I don't know what I was expecting.  I was afraid it was in a bad area, but it was not at…

title: We enjoyed it
